My boyfriend and I stayed at Sovay's during our 3 night mini vacation to Austin. The accommodations are just as Sovay describes them. Guests have access to a private bedroom bathroom and free reign to the kitchen/living room area. We felt very much at home and enjoyed being able to make use of the kitchen. 

Sovay's house is in a convenient location a short walk to coffee shops bike rental and restaurants on Barton Springs Rd. as well as Zilker Park where you can stroll around swim and kayak. Downtown Austin is not as quick of a walk - especially in the heat - but it's possible and we walked in once. It's much more comfortable to walk a couple blocks to the bus stop and take a quick bus ride downtown.

Unfortunately we stayed busy enough that we never got to meet Sovay - but she was very hospitable and helpful through emails and texts. We appreciated that she didn't mind us coming and going at odd hours.

Susan and Anthony were very accommodating. We arrived around midnight our first night (we are late travelers). Breakfast was wonderful. I must compliment the hosts with regards to their coffee. The accommodations were very cozy.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: Very nice clean comfortable place to stay in a cool neighborhood.  Restaurants trails parks Barton Springs Pool Botanical gardens and a sculpture park are all within walking distance.  Sovay was a great host and provided a really good list of things to do and see.
Nice and convienant to most everything.  The bathroom and shower is very small.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: The loft was perfect for our weekend stay.  The instructions the owner sent were on point and were helpful.  We will definitely stay there in the future!

Andy and Ellen were incredibly gracious hosts. The stocked fridge  fabulous local restaurant recommendations and eclectic art/book collection are lovely touches to their warm homey cottage. 

This is now our go-to place anytime we visit Austin.
Stayed here for a weekend. The place was indeed very cozy and the bed was comfortable. We slept like babies. Ashley even left us some beer in the fridge. We would definitely stay here again.
The Birdhouse is a clean calm quiet and beautiful space.
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: We absolutely loved the place and would recommend it to anyone looking for a great place to stay in Austin!!!  It was very close to everything and felt like a vacation get-away.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: Marcus Ollington was very courteous and concerned for the well-being of his customers. He went out of the way to make me feel welcome.

Even before we stayed we had a few questions and Lois answered our questions quickly.  Awesome communication!  Lois' place is very colorful peaceful and spiritual.  The neighborhood is very quiet and safe.  There is amazing art pieces around and there is so much detail in the space.  The instructions were clear and Lois offered to answer any questions that we may have whether it is about Austin where to eat and what to do.  Finding the house was very easy because you can't miss the mermaid or Lois' awesome car.  There are plenty of pillows to use as well as plenty of blankets.  The rental includes towels and Lois does include some toiletries but we used our own.  We found that by staying here we were very close to downtown and many amazing restaurants.  There is so much to do with the park near by and all that Austin has to offer.  Thank you so much Lois for the the fantastic hospitality!

Sovay's property is fantastic. My room was very clean neat and quiet and the private washroom was very well stocked and very clean as well. Sovay was a very gracious host and I thank her for making my stay in Austin pleasant and relaxing. I highly recommend this bnb.

House was impeccably clean and nice and Susan was very helpful and very easy to coordinate with before our arrival. House has a coffee and ice cream shop a block away and is walkable to restaurants and shops on South Congress Ave. I was there with three friends and we all enjoyed ourselves and would recommend/stay again.

Lovely little place!  Perfect for two people.  Everything was clean and comfy and the fridge was even stocked with goodies.  Andy was a very welcoming host and got the place ready for us on super-short notice when our other accommodations (non-Air BNB) fell through.  The location is also great - close to everything in a very quiet and charming part of Austin.  Easy access to Mopac and Lamar.  We would definitely stay there again.
First time airbnb user impressed by the experience. Stay was great was better than I expected.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: The photographer and his assistant for my wedding were guests at this residence and they said it was even better than the photos. They enjoyed their stay and are now hooked on airbnb. Many thanks to dolina for being such a gracious host!
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: I stayed here in May 2011 and absolutely loved it.  It is located in the best neighborhood in Austin walking distance to almost everything you need.  It is clean bright and modern and very quiet.  And Drew and Simone are really fantastic owners...very responsive and helpful.  At the last minute our plans changed and my wife and two young sons joined me for the first 10 days of my stay--Drew and Simone accomodated us happily and made our stay a very pleasant one.  I have stayed several places in Austin and this place was the absolute best. Thanks!

Lois was a wonderful host! She made GREAT restaurant recommendations too! Her place itself was absolutely amazing. While the place looks exactly as  it looks in photos it is even BETTER in person. The colors and set up made it a very unique harmonious and comforting stay. Wish we had more time to spend in Austin and to get to know Lois more. This place is highly recommended. I would stay here again if I'm ever in the area.

Marcus was a wonderful host and the apartment was cozy quite and peaceful.  I came in from overseas and realized after I arrived that I didn't have the exact address of the apartment.  So I decided I would just get in the general area and then call Marcus. But he called within minutes and was waiting for my arrival.  He emailed before my flight left and then I had another email from him when I arrived Newark.  It was all very comforting to know that when I arrived in the states I had a cozy place to crash and get over jet lag. I highly recommend his place. I know if I'm in the area again I'll be staying here again.

My friends and I were travelling through the US from New Zealand and booked in to stay at Maryƒ??s house. The house was just perfect. It was pristinely clean and so cute. Close to everything and so lovely to come home to after a day (and night) out discovering Austin. 

Mary is so helpful with nothing seemingly to be a problem. She knows Austin like the back of her hand and is always available for questions or advice. I highly recommend Marys house for any one that wants to discover Austin. Thanks again Mary we loved it...hopefully we will be back for South by South West!!

Wow! Thank you Sara for sharing your cottage with us. The room was clean thoughtfully decorated and comfortable. The air conditioning was essental and the WIFI was excellent. Simply perfect! Also the neighborhood is quiet and beautiful. And the location is close but not too close to the city center. Thus made for a perfect Austin weekend getaway. I definitely recommend it!

Anthony and Susan were very thorough considerate and helpful. Their place is spacious neat and private. At their suggestion we took a walk around the neighborhood. We really enjoyed the peaceful and pleasant ambience. The great part is that it is only 15 minutes drive to downtown. We would love to stay here if we visit austin again.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: Sovay is a wonderful host and her cute house is right in a quiet central part of town. A leisurely 1-mile walk took us to the stunning Barton Springs pool and one block away from Sovay's house is the extra-fun Alamo Drafthouse Theater. We had a great time :)

This home was very clean and welcoming! Susan had a guide waiting for us listing all we needed to know for our stay. The beds were really comfortable and we had the best sleep we've had in quite some time. The location is amazingly close to everything too! Overall a very positive experience and would definately stay there again!

Perfect place perfect hosts perfect stay.  My parents were looking for a quiet comfortable rental in Tarrytown and we found it!  The cottage apartment was roomy for 2 and very clean as well. Kelly and her husband were so hospitable and easy to work with especially since it was our first time using airbnb.  If it's available my parents will be staying here again when they visit.

The pics and reviews accurately describe the property & experience. Colorful funky and fun all perfectly work for this location. Lois is so friendly and eager to ensure that your stay is pleasurable and she totally respects "your space".

Dolina and her family were most accommodating. The "birdhouse" casita was perfect for our needs. Beautiful backyard great privacy and total mutual respect for space. The location was great away from the noise and crowds but close enough to get to S. Congress in a few minutes. When my wife return to Austin we will certainly book with Dolina again. She made us feel super welcome right away. Anyone would be silly not to go this route and go to a fancy sterile and expensive hotel. Highyl highly highly recommend Dolina's birdhouse!
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: We found a gem! The house was absolutely beautiful inside and out...far nicer than anything we could have imagined! Not only was it immaculate and well maintained the hosts were very accommodating to our special requests. And the architecture and decor were so attractive we were proud to have important guests come celebrate our daughter's graduation from law school with us. Thank you so much Robbie for providing a perfect backdrop for us to fondly remember such a significant occasion in our lives!

This is a lovely space and David is a great host.  The thoughtful  "little" details like having fresh coffee beans ready to be ground in the morning; the interesting magazines and local information readily available; the ability to record TV; really easy going check in and check out process all adds up to making staying away from home so much more wonderful.  The walking trail and the view of the lake are icing on the cake.  I look forward to being able to come back next time I am in Austin.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: Our stay in Austin could not have been nicer. The apartment is as advertised and more--clean comfortable and just plain nice. Because I knew the Hyde Park area I knew what to expect and where to find whatever--and there is a lot in the area. Whether it's taking a walk to get a cup of coffee or dinner at Mother's etc. or just taking a run the area is the perfect base for an Austin visit. Drew and his wife could not have been more considerate of us as guests and we hope to stay here again when we visit our daughter. And don't overlook a visit to the Elizabet Ney historic site a few blocks away. It's one of the best sites of its type that I've run across.

Andy and Ellen provided us with very private and secure accommodation in a cottage at the rear of their house.

We had a rental car so nowhere was too far away.  Downtown was onlly 10 minutes.  

Ellen had stocked the fridge and cupboards with breakfast choices to suit any taste but we were more than happy to have the fresh friuit yoghurts cereals and eggs which we had missed at our previous motel stays.  Andy and Ellen gave us suggestions about where to go  for eating and areas of interest which we appreciated.  We will always have pleasant memories of Austin.  Thank you Andy and Ellen.

Sevylla has a wonderful space - clean private and centrally located.  (About a ten-minute drive to downtown.)  In addition she's a really interesting lady who's a lot of fun to talk to!  Two enthusiastic thumbs up.
You'll be comfortable don't worry about it just book if it's available.  Dolina is awesome I wish I would have had time to hang out with her.
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: Sara and her husband have provided a great place to stay! My wife and I were in town for a wedding and the central location of this place can't be beat. Bathroom is spacious for 2 people and the shower was top notch! The bed is good and the desk/fridge are added bonuses. We WILL stay here again.

Got in quite late from the airport and Slyvia was very accommodating. She hooked us up with maps and advice on places to go (Barton Springs Pool is awesome). Definitely a great place to stay easy walking distance to Sixth St action and definitely better than paying for a hotel.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: The house was fantastic! It had everything we needed for a weekend away from home. The kitchen had all the necessities the bath had towels and soaps as well as outdoor towels the bedding was very comfortable and there was ample seating space in the living room. Great place and we definitely will stay there again if we need a weekend away in Austin.

Sara and Travis were super nice and accommodating - we enjoyed meeting them and staying in their cottage.  Had a great experience and trip in Austin and made some great memories riding the bikes we rented from Sara.  The cottage was exactly as described and we would not only recommend staying here but might see if it's available the next time we're in town!

Our stay was perfect. Susan and Anthony were great and went out of their way to help us out. We traveled with our two young sons and Susan was knd enough to lend us several boxes of toys and books which our 2 year old absolutely loved! The location was perfect literally nestled between everything in town but far enough west to where you could get some peace and quiet. The neighborhood itself is one of the finest in Austin and we felt very safe being there. The apartment was attached to the back of their house with its own seperate walkway to its private entrance. We were absolutely blown away by how nice and sacious it was and the Japanese tub was awesome - very relaxing. If you are looking for a quiet safe clean place that is less than a 5 minute drive to everything then look no further. We will stay here every time we are in Austin!
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments:
Our first experience with Airbnb and Andy made it a great one.  He was very patient and accommodating when we needed to change plans at the last minute. 

The cottage is great. In a quiet and very pretty older Austin neighborhood. The A/C unit kept everything very comfortable inside and the kitchen was stocked with a wide variety of breakfast items and drinks. It was an awesome place to fall back to and recharge after a long day out and about with our fellow RTXers.
Drew was a great host.  He was very responsive and helpful.  The flat was exactly as advertised nice and very clean as reflected in the photos.  Hyde Park is also an excellent location.

Kelly was a great host.  She recommended an awesome Tex-Mex place down the street.  Her guest house is beautiful and inspiring.  It was the perfect place to land after a two day drive.  The neighborhood is worth mentioning too. Old West Austin feels safe and stable.

Dolina and her family were ideal hosts.  Their rental property was exceptionally clean and inviting.  The Birdhouse is truly one of Austin's more creative architectural gems.  Dolina went above and beyond by including a plethora of extras upon our arrival (i.e. breakfast drinks and foods and chocolate).  After staying at this property for 4 wonderful nights I can see why it is booked solid throughout the summer.  Best yet in ATX!
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: Michael and his wife were wonderful hosts - so friendly and nice! They made us feel extremely welcome and at home. We loved their garage apartment. It was beautifully decorated and nicely furnished with a super comfy memory foam bed microwave full-size fridge cook top and even a projection (website hidden) worked great. The location was AMAZING. We were seriously just one block away from South Congress and all the restaurants and shops there. Guerros Hey Cupcake HEB grocery store etc. A very happening and hip neighborhood yet the garage apartment was very tranquil and quiet. It's also walkable to the So Co bridge where the bats fly out every night at dusk. A must see! The apartment was well stocked with toiletries and any amenities we might need. If you want to save $$ by not eating out you can pick up groceries and use the apartment kitchenette. I would highly recommend staying here.
Nice home in a quiet neighborhood. Very hospitable. Extremely comfortable bed. Would stay here again.

My daughter and I stayed in this wonderful apartment while we moved her out of her Austin college home.  We were able to relax enjoy Austin and allow her to say goodbye to her home for the last four years.  The apartment was clean well appointed and our hosts were hospitable.  We will be back!  maryclare & bess

The loft was just as lovely as pictured with friendly neighbors to boot. The kitchen was fully equipped and I wished I had been able to stay longer. Having the gated access to the complex was super-convenient and I enjoyed exploring that part of town. The shower was great; the bed was fine; the host anticipated every need-- I'll be back for a second stay.

We wanted a location close to downtown - check.  Somethng quiet - check.  Not a hotel something w/charm - check.  Super comfortable bed - check.  Sovay was extra accomodating - she made coffee provided site seeing ideas and made her laundry available.  I like to run - the location is a 10 min walk/ 5 min run from the Town Lake trail.  Evertyhing went of seemlessly from check in to check out.  Thanks Sovay!

Hosts are extremely nice and generous. Couldn't be more thoughtful. Cottage is clean private and reasonably comfortable. Loads of extras like mountain bikes and bbq pit at your disposal snacks drinks in the fridge staples like coffee eggs and milk and fresh tomatoes from their garden! Futon is decent though a little awkward for two but no problem for younger adults I'm sure (guess I'm getting old haha).

Lois's place is fantastic! I am a weird one myself so I loved the colorful location and all of the art work in and around her house. 

She was very accommodating to our needs and left us to our own devices. The space is huge and comfortable I definitely would recommend this to my friends.
Cozy and conveniently located off of 35. Sevylla is a great host!

Sylvia's place was very comfortable and private.  Even though we stayed there in the summer the place stayed nice and cool.  The location was very convenient for us and Sylvia was very friendly and considerate.  Great place to stay!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Very nice place with special touches like a bottle of wine ice cream in the fridge extra towels for Barton Creek swimming and written directions to near by attractions.  Much better than a hotel.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: Drew And Simone were great hosts! Their place was spotless and smelled so clean and fresh.I did"nt have a blow dryer so Drew went and bought one for me to use.They are truly accommdating and made sure we were very comfortable.

The house was beautiful well furnished and located in a quiet and safe neighborhood. We were provided with everything we needed. We were very appreciative of the WIFI and the TV provided upon request. Before arrival we were offered a variety of options for breakfast and it was brought to us each morning with a latte and juice. The house is even better than it appears in photos and the location is excellent. The owners were wonderful and very responsive and ensured that we had a great visit. Thank you for your warm and gracious hospitality. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at your home. On our next visit to Austin we hope to stay here again!
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: This space was a haven of creativity and imagination in the middle of a great city! My friends and I stayed one night in order to see the band Beirut in concert and we enjoyed our accommodations nearly as much as the show! Lois was very friendly and made us feel right at home. It's private and really quite beautiful. I would definitely recommend this place.

Our stay at the Bungalow was amazing. Katherine is super friendly and easy to connect with. The house was very clean and organized and had everything we needed in the kitchen bathroom bedrooms and living room. I stayed there with my 3 year old and there were toys and books for her to use and movies for her to watch. The neighborhood is one of the best in Austin. You can walk to so many great places and Katherine leaves a list of these places for you when you visit. 
I recommend this place to everyone who is visiting Austin especially if you have children!

Sovay is a very interesting multileveled person who is very knowledgable inmany areas of interest. In my quest to possibly relocate here in Austin she is a wonderful local resource and would be a great friend.

This is the perfect location.  Private. Close to everything in Austin.  And a very gracious host.  Marcus was ready to help out with any thing I needed.  This is why I choose airbnb!  The community is the best! 

You'll want to stay here.

this is a lovely nicely appointed clean simple place ideal for our needs and we completely enjoyed our stay
the hosts are a personable welcoming couple and we can heartily recommend their cottage

I had a peaceful respite at Kelly and Louie's cottage.  They were gracious and helpful hosts.  So kind and welcoming.  The cottage was perfect for Nana to host a sleepover with grandkids and to have some dedicated time with them yet grab some quite time for me..  Great neighborhood with lots of old world charm.  Will visit again when I come to town to see family.

My experience at the "Lotus house" was fantastic! Everything about it was just magnificent. You think the picture looks great just wait till you get there. Also Alyson was an amazing host she showed us great places we can visit and also she even took me to her own yoga class it was very fun! I will never forget my experience there and there for I would recommend this for anyone so pack your bags and get ready to make some great memories and not to mention the experience of a life time.

We had the loveliest stay at Viviane and Michael's. They have a beautiful house and are gracious hosts. We had a lovely room with bathroom to ourselves and were welcome to come and go as we pleased. 

Off-street parking and driving to South Congress or up to 6th St was very easy (though not waking distance). We caught a taxi home after a night out with a few drinks on 6th St which was less than $15 (possibly closer to $10 but I don't remember precisely). 

Michael provided some excellent dining and drinking recommendations. Coffee/tea/juice were provided for breakfast which was a good start to the day too. We would definitely recommend to someone coming to stay in Austin (especially if you have a car to get around easily).

Nice little quirky flat in a wonderful location walking distance to Flipnotics Coffee Alamo Draft House and Shady Grove as well as Zilker Park and the River.  Lois is easy to deal with.  Be aware that you sleep on futons on the floor which was fine for us.  Also this is not self-catering as there are no kitchen facilities not even microwave.  But good price for a wonderful location with a cozy loft feel.

Ashley's place is in the most charming neighborhoods in Austin.  Her home is a great space with lots of character.  It's close to tons of great places to hang out from coffee shops to restaurants and a dog park!
listing_name: FAB 2 bDR where Airbnb CEO stays!

comments:
Absolutely everything we had hoped for. Comfortable terrific location quiet clean well furnished.
Susan was gracious thoughtful and truly went the extra mile to make us feel welcome.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: MR. Doria was great !! It was a great house and very accommodating. Great location. I would very much recommend this house to anyone.

The stay with Sovay couldn't have been better even though I didn't get to see her much. 

The bedroom and bathroom was impeccable with towels folded as by an expert and with assorted necessities available in the bathroom.

The bungalow itself was also lovely and the environment quiet and you could easily walk or bike downtown through the beautiful surroundings.

We loved our stay at the cottage! More than we expected! lots of goodies in the fridge! beautiful garden! fresh tomatoes and pepper by the door!!! that was nice!!! a lilltle far from downtown but very close to the major highway! We really enjoyed the tranquility of the neighborhood! Highly recommend this cottage! Thank you Andy and Ellen!

The condo was adorable and in a great Austin location. Lynne provided everything we needed and was easy to communicate with. Parking was available and it was easy to cab to/from downtown. The Barton Springs pool is about a five-minute walk and there's a market next door for any provisions you might have forgotten. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend!

To say that Kevin is a helpful host would be a gross understatement. He not only recommended places to check out during my visit he even suggested neighborhoods to check out when I relocated. The flat itself is very nice. Centrally located and close to the highway. Highly recommend staying here. Great host. Beautiful flat. Ridiculously comfy bed. Doesn't get better than that.

My stay in Austin was just about the greatest road trip I've had. Sevylla was an incredible host and the room was exactly as I saw it in the picture. This was my first time every using airbnb and I'll admit I was pretty nervous but she definitly made us feel comfortable. It was super clean and comfortable. I have absolutely nothing to complain about and nothing went wrong. Everything we needed to know about the city was accessable to us. Didn't get to see you play Sevylla! But I definitly had a great time. I liked my stay so much we HAD to ask for an extra day and of course Sevylla was okay with it. Thank you Sevylla. I think I had too much of a wonderful time ;)

We really enjoyed our stay at Marcus' place. It had a very comfortable bed and was large enough not to feel cramped even with 2 of us there. It was easy to get to from 35 which allowed us to navigate easily around town even though we are not natives to the area. Marcus was a very enjoyable host-even gave us a ride to the concert we were there to attend!! He was very accessible both before & after our stay.
We had a great stay here.  Clean and classic Austin in a great area.  Susan and her family were very welcoming but not intrusive would definitely stay there again (and again)
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments:
Sylvia was straight forward and helped us (Austin newbies) with some cool places to eat and check out. This place is uber centrally located as well. 

Hoping to see her again when we visit!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: I stayed with Elizabeth Foix for two weeks with my 7 year old grandson while he attended a camp in Austin. Elizabeth and David were great -friendly and welcoming very laid back people. Their house was quiet and very clean easy to come and go a very relaxing stay.  Would recommend it to anyone as a good place to stay.

Staying with these two wonderful people was really fantastic. The private and bathroom were very clean. 
I would highly recommend staying there!

We had a wonderful stay at Bill & Melissa's place!  It was a beautiful location that was close enough to everything to be handy but also just far enough to give a sense of escape ... which we all need sometimes.  The property is fun to explore and the loft is super-comfy to come back to.  We enjoyed being able to fix our breakfasts there and just take the mornings slowly.  Highly recommend.

Mary's yellow cottage was the perfect stay for our relaxing girls getaway weekend in Austin! It was cute clean and cozy! She even had coffee and bagels for us for in the morning. We would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it for anyone who wants a great location and place to stay in Austin!
My family came for a visit and they stayed with Sara and Travis - loved it! Charming cottage quiet and centrally located. Thank you!

This place was awesome my only regret was not staying longer! Sevylla is an awesome hostess with a great relaxed vibe! Her house was super cool and she was very helpful with telling us where the cool places in town were! The room was comfortable and a lot bigger than it looks in the pic! Clean comfortable and cool! Everything a traveler could want. I definitely recommend this place to anyone passing through Austin! I'll definitely be back!

Had a great stay at Zilker Park. Lois' place is exactly as described our only regret was that she was under the weather while we were there and we didn't have a chance to get to know he as well as we'd have liked. This was a great place with good energy and super cozy during the (rare) torrential downpour for one of the nights we were there. Thanks Lois -- great hosting!

This is an incredible cottage! Everything was beautiful clean and decorated nicely. Travis was extremely friendly and gave us recommendations for nearby restaurants and nightlife; we actually ended up chatting for awhile! 

We will absolutely stay here again and have been telling all of our friends about this cottage.

My husband and I used the flat as "home base" for the first week of a two-week trip to Texas. It was the perfect choice! Drew and Simone could not have been more welcoming and friendly. And the location was easily accessible in a pretty neighborhood that's a combination of funk and charm. The apartment itself was fresh efficient clean and inviting...a pleasure to return to after various day-trips and local adventures. We would return in a heartbeat.

Angele was a wonderful host and made herself very accessable to answer any questions I had while I was staying at the condo on a work trip. The location is great in a quiet neighborhood and a short walk to everything (6th street shops Whole Foods etc). 

The condo itself was extremely clean nicely decorated and had everything you needed. There was even laundry detergent and a lent roller in the walk-in closet. The air conditioning was wonderful considering I was in Austin during June when the daily temperature was 102 degrees. Being one who prefers to sleep in my bed than anywhere else I slept great in the fluffy bed; pillows were comfortable as well. In fact the worst part of the entire stay was waking up early in the morning to go to work. 

Great place great host. I would highly recommend this rental for anyone visiting Austin.

This place is very comfortable with a striking and functional design. With two decks and a screened porch you can't go wrong. The location was great for access to Far West and close to Mopac for the rest of Austin. Around the corner you'll find Allen County Memorial Park for a picnic or walk but even the neighborhood itself was well forested and shady.  Our hostess was very gracious and provided all the amenities one could want. It was a perfect and relaxing place to stay.

Susan's Bungalow was a terrific.  Allison and I enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend this location to anyone looking for a place in Central Austin.

Neighborhood/Location:  The home is centrally located in a very cool quiet neighborhood.  I should qualify quiet as there is a train that passes a few blocks over on a not infrequent basis.  That said I never heard it once I was asleep.  If you are a light sleeper keep this in mind and pack some earplugs.  Everything--food music food...are all within  a quick drive bike ride or in milder weather walkable.  Once Over Coffee a solid coffee shop with street cred among barristas is minutes away.

Home:  First this place is as immaculate as a place can get without losing its character.  Bedrooms offer comfy beds and the backyard is a pleasant bamboo bordered oasis. 

We'll definitely check Susan's availability on our next trip to Austin.

Andy has a great cottage in a wonderful location.  The hosts were very polite and made sure we had everything we needed and then some.  They provided us with access to bicycles and organic snacks.  I would highly reccomend this cottage to anyone looking for a relaxed setting.
Great area nice place good coffee

Amazing little cottage. Absolutely perfect for our group of four. Simple directions excellent location adorable house with such nice amenities I ecspecially appreciated the Keurig Coffee Maker and Brita filtered water as well as the water bottles Mary so thoughtfully had out for us. The backyard patio was super cute and perfect for a hot summer night! I will defnitely be looking into this same rental unit if I ever find myself in need of one in Austin again!

OMG !!!! What a great experience! Really hip decor meticulously clean very inviting comfy. so South Austin cool....

Patty was great! Very attentive but not at all intrusive. She was so accommodating that when I wanted to rent a bike to ride to town lake (A Must!)  she just let me borrow hers...

She also offered up her kayak for moonlight trip down town lake but didn't squeeze that in.

Cab ride to Saxon pub dirt cheap and thinking of reserving for ACL which is also only a few minutes away.

Love the funky South Austin scene love Patty loved the whole crazy experience!!!

Thumbs way Up !!
listing_name: Cool South Central Home for rent

comments: The host canceled my reservation 8 days before arrival.

Everything was exactly as stated right down to the earplugs :)  The house was darling very clean comfortable and well furnished.  The train nearby was just not a big deal for any of us.  If we ever get back to Austin this would be our first choice again!

Hope was a wonderful host! My boyfriend and I came into the place and it was totally clean and very comfortable. She even left the most delicious cookies for us! The air conditioning was a nice refuge from the summer heat. I also LOVED that the apartment was a 2 minute walk away from a Starbucks a grocery store and a bunch of great restaurants. And it was close to a couple bus stops. Very convenient location. There is also a great kitchen with everything you need to make a yummy meal. 

Hope wasn't around much - though we did get to meet her and she was extraordinarily sweet and welcoming. I would definitely stay again and I would recommend the place to any friends or family visiting Austin! :]
This location is perfect for anyone looking to be close to downtown and south Austin.  Everything was kept nice and clean.  Sylvia the host was very nice.  I would definitely recommend staying here.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: I had a great stay in Andy and Ellen's private cottage. They were completely accommodating of my shifting plans and when I arrived I found the guest house adorable spotless and stocked with more breakfast choices than one really should have. They made great suggestions for how I might pass the time and made all of their facilities available to me. If you don't mind the short commute into the city (I used one of their bikes) and don't object to a futon bed you will really enjoy this private comfortable hideaway in a beautiful character neighbohood.

The space is described perfectly. It was incredibly relaxing and peaceful. 
The location is perfect to discover Austin and I would love to stay again.

Traveled with out dog and had a great experience. Cottage was clean quiet and convient to downtown. Wireless Internet was very useful. Great little coffee shop (also dog friendly) just a short walk from cottage.

Susan was absolutely great. I was able to work out accomodation while on the road to Austin at 8:30 am. She was very quick to respond provide info about the city and Susan made sure I was having a good time and never ran out of things to do. 

The place was great home away from home. The location was perfect. Far enough away from the center to be peaceful but close enough to make traveling back and forth a breeze. 

The bathroom was awesome!

Highly Recommended for those looking to spend time in Austin.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: Awesome time in Austin. Location is wonderful. Had a Great Stay!

For my first trip to Austin Angele could *not* have been more accommodating! The Clarksville neighborhood was sweet and quiet great restaurants and coffeeshops to walk to. Directions and instructions were clear and easy; apartment was clean and tidy. We were happy to see (the morning after our late night arrival) there was coffee in the freezer ƒ?? and so we left behind some snacks and beer to sweeten the deal for the next Airbnb'er. I'd definitely go back and stay there again!

Great place for family stay!  My husband and two boys (age 8 and 10) stayed over the weekend and it was perfect!  We slept on the bed and the kids slept on the fold-out sofa.  The apt was very clean and looked just as pictured!  What worked out well for us were all the amenities (kitchen washer/dryer dvd player etc..) we found quite useful traveling with kids.  The back yard has a tree house and the home is located near a neighborhood pool.  We loved the neighborhood..quiet and safe.  Location was good...close to Barton Springs downtown and Congress.  No doubt this is the place we will go to any time we visit Austin!

The apartment was awesome!! It's very clean and comfortable and within walking distance of many fun places.  Sylvia is so helpful and has a lot of brochures and info on fun things to do in Austin.  STAY HERE!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Our stay with Joep & Courtney was due to a wedding being held nearby & reception at the Barr Mansion. The location was the perfect distance between the two.  Because  of our schedule we used the place as a crash pad after a full day of events. Thanks to our hosts for everything! The space was delightful clean and the hosts were very engaging.  Our only problem was in the 104 degree heat of Austin the air conditioner left the house on the warm side.
We just loved Mary's cottage. It was cute cozy and extremely clean.  She even left us bagels and juice for breakfast! We will definitely stay there again.

The condo was great and Lynne was awesome to work with.  Wonderful south Austin location--quiet walking distance to Zilker park minutes from downtown.  The condo itself is a warm and cozy vacation spot.  It was very comfortably furnished and had a nice tree-covered balcony with a table and chairs.  Inside there is a small desk with a stand-alone LCD monitor mouse and keyboard and wireless internet access all for easy connection to your laptop.  Note that there is no TV--which for me was a plus.  Note also that it is on the second floor and there are no elevators--which made no difference to me either but for some people could be a deal breaker.  We had a great time and will hopefully be back!

Fantastic experience! We stayed at Drew's garage flat for two nights after our weding in July.  We had to come in very late but we let Drew know and he left the lights on for us - along with a bottle of wine and chocolate!  What a wonderful surprise. Drew was a pleasure to interact with and we always felt well taken care of.

The place was VERY clean.  The room was wonderfully arranged - my wife and I took home some decorating ideas ;)  The paint was a lovely green smooth bamboo floors a comfy futon... great.  Air conditioning was good even though it was 100 degrees outside.  Curtains for plenty of privacy.  Drew even let us park in the garage!   We only wish we could stay more!

Be sure to stop at the Hyde Park convenience store - it's amazing!

Sovay is sweet very approachable and made us fell very welcomed. She and her family even invited us to a backyard cookout they had on July 4th. 
She is a great resource for fun things to do in Austin but the best part of the stay was the location of her place. It's within walking distance of Zilker park. We had a great time.

Great location great house great host! My husband and I stayed here with our 8 month old baby and it was perfect for our stroller walks to S. Congress S. 1st and S. Lamar. It was also super close to Barton Springs Zilker area and downtown. Susan had everything we needed on hand and was friendly easy going and gracious. We will use Airbnb every time we travel. So much better than staying in a stuffy hotel!
Angele's condo was in excellent condition and very clean. The neighborhood is quiet and pretty. Great parking spot! A 5-10 minute drive to just about everything. Highly recommended!

Dan was an absolute pleasure to stay with. Room is as pictured garden is beautiful. Despite it being the middle of summer the room was very cool and comfortable. Dan's dog is also very sweet.

Dan was very accommodating when I had to show up a few hours later than we had discussed. I felt very much at home.

Would definitely stay here again.
The host canceled my reservation 66 days before arrival.

What a wonderfully relaxing time in Austin.  Kelly and Louie were great hosts and have provided a beautiful place to stay.  The mattress was very comfortable and made sleeping-in very easy to do.  The cottage apartment was wonderfully decorated neat and very clean.  Fresh flowers bottled water and fruit were a welcome site upon arrival as we arrived at Austin later than expected.  The cottage is close to Zilker Park and downtown.  We are very pleased we had the opportunity to stay here and experience the city from a vantage point other than a hotel room.  My wife and I would highly recommended staying with Kelly!

The place is very nice!! Sylvia was a great host and gave us
a lot of useful information. We especially appreciate her assistance with
arrangements  to see a special gig and other venues -
thank you once again Sylvia! The apt is just as described and very conveniently located. 
I will recommend this place to all my friends both in Europe and the U.S. should they plan to visit Austin.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments:
Things were excellent here. Place is very centrally located AC works really well (critical in Austin during the summer) really clean and well appointed.

Lots of excellent bakeries (Quacks!) & restaurants nearby and easy to get anywhere.

Drew was very accommodating and I learned something about my own chickens by talking to him about his. Fresh eggs if you ask for them!

We couldn't have asked for a better first airbnb experience! Before we even arrived Sovay had sent us a very detailed list of nearly 30 cool spots to check out in Austin. Very useful and we hitup several of them which definitely enhanced our experience!
From the moment we got there until we left we were treated like guests at a 5 star hotel. From egyptian cotton sheets to beautiful bath towels...and even little things like a toothbrush (I forgot mine) and wonderful smelling oatmeal soap the experience was absolutely amazing! She has set the bar so high that I think it will be pretty difficult to match much less beat. The house itself is very cute too...and the price is unbeatable!
lovely stay GREAT location comfy bed roomy condo

My stay with Sara and Travis couldn't have been better. They were extremely accommodating. Sara gave me a long list of places to go see and eat all of which were great. Both Sara and Travis are extremely kind and I enjoyed seeing them around and chatting. Obviously from the pictures the cottage is very lovely and it was the perfect environment for me to relax and write.

Sovay was a wonderful host who did absolutely everything to make my stay pleasant and hassle-free.  I also stayed at her second suite (the "Itty Bitty Bungalow") and she offered to drive me over there which saved on time and made it quite convenient.  I definitely would have no hesitations recommending either of her places to future guests.  In terms of getting downtown both suites are close to bus routes but the Itty Bitty Bungalow is a bit closer (the #10 is right across the street).

A great place in downtown Austin close to shops swimming restaurants and entertainment. I chose to stay here rather than in North Austin to commute (approx 15-20 minutes) to enjoy and see more of the city. The host was great at arranging everything the room very clean and the complementary bottle of wine delicious.

We had an awesome weekend at the Cottage! The space is welcoming attractive clean and very cool.  We had our six year old and his 11 year old cousin and we were all very comfortable.  The kids loved the tree house in the backyard.  Kelly was a wonderful hostess and led us to two of our favorite dining experiences of the weekend Home Slice (delicious pizza) and Shady Grove (awesome concert). This was our first experience with airbnb and based on our outstanding stay at Kelly's we will definitely use airbnb for all of our travels in the future.  Thanks Kelly and I will be scouring the internet for that Fiest and Band of Horses concert posters. ;-)

Nice apartment INCREDIBLE location.  Walk to everything fun.  Downtown is right across I35 but I suggest hitting up the bars on the east side.  Comfy bed and tons of space.  Sylvia is nice as can be and it is apparent that she loves her place and her city.  Check this place out for sure!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Ashley is a FABULOUS host and she KNOWS Austin! Her recommendations were awesome and the house was charming. Loved being 2 minutes from downtown. Highly recommend staying here.
listing_name: FAB 2 bDR where Airbnb CEO stays!

comments: This is an excellent place to stay!  I couldn't have imagined a better set up.  It is perfect for one or two people and there is a bus directly across the street that can take you downtown.  By cab it is only about a 5-minute ride or so from downtown.
great very clean convenient place!
Sara's little cottage is wonderful! It's very clean and the shower is wonderful. The bed is comfortable and there's even a coffee pot and a mini-fridge.

the room was cute and comfortable with a nice bed and soft sheets and the suite was very private. sovay was very helpful and gracious even though i only met her once! the location is great--i walked into and from downtown a number of times quite easily and took the bus a couple of other times which is very conveniently located near the house. i highly recommend staying here!
Nice modern clean condo in West Austin... Went and stayed for business and would definitely come back. Angele was responsive helpful and truly cared about the quality of my stay!

The Cottage was just perfect for our family.  It was located in the hub of Austin had all the amenities plus more and was as cute as can be!  Mary was very welcoming and assured us we could call her if we needed anything.  

Thanks Mary for providing such a perfect home for us!

My family's stay in Susan's house was fantastic. From start to finish Susan was accessible and helpful. Her house is clean well appointed homey and is in an ideal location in Austin. Our stay could not have been better and we will stay at Susan's whenever we are in Austin and the house is available.

Susan and Anthony were so very welcoming to me. I stayed with them for a month while working  at a short summer internship. They were just fabulous hosts. The space was always clean and cozy. They even helped me navigate Austin. I look forward to keeping in touch with them and will always appreciate their hospitality.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: Tammy was a great hostess.  She has a lovely home.  The whole experience was wonderful.  AUSTIN IS AWESOME AND SO ARE THE PEOPLE.

I spent four nights at Drew's place while in Austin for business and let me tell you his place is very clean and very comfortable.  The air-conditioner worked very well keeping the flat nice and cool even when it was over 100 degrees outside.  The shower bathroom kitchenette and utensils were clean and the towels and linen smelled freshly washed.  The night I arrived I found a bottle of wine and a bar of dark chocolate that he left as a thank you.  It sure hit the spot.  He allowed me to park my rental car in his garage which was an extra plus. The neighborhood in which this rental is located is extremely peaceful and quiet.  It's also a short drive to downtown Austin.  I highly recommend Drew's flat to anyone who sincerely appreciates a simple yet comfortable and clean environment.  I'd be more than happy to stay there again.

Sovay was a fabulous host! My sister and I were on a road trip from California to New York and decided to check out Austin. Sovay responded to our email very quickly and welcomed us graciously - despite it being very last minute! The place was clean nice and cozy. It was also in a great location in Austin. Sovay was extremely helpful - she gave us tips on everything from where to find the best live music to the best Mexican restaurants. Sovay and this suite absolutely contributed to our perfect mini-vacation in Austin - we couldn't have asked for anything more. Thank you!!
Andy and Ellen are great hosts very helpful and friendly! I loved the cottage which has everything you need for a pleasant stay in Austin.
Accommodating host.  Respectful and easy to work with and communicate with.   Property is as described.

This apartment perfectly fulfilled what we were after: space privacy and a cozy neighborhood. A quick walk to Mozart's a lakeside cafe and just a 10 minute drive to the hustle and bustle of downtown this set-up is ideal for people who just want to get away for a bit. We didn't really call on Susan for her expertise but if she knows Austin like she knows how to set up a room then we're sure she's a great guide. The bathroom was incredible too which didn't hurt.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: Excellent amenities and Angele was easy to be reached when I had any questions.

We had an absolutely wonderful time staying at the Loft on Cupid's Bluff.  Bill and Melissa were more than hospitable and the charm of the loft was beautiful.  They were wonderful at communicating with us before and during our stay and made us so comfortable while staying there.  Plus there is nothing like having a large balcony to dance under the stars at night.  I definitely recommend them and their lovely home to any interested and I certainly plan on staying with them again.

This was an excellent place to stay.  The place was clean located close to downtown and just a joy to stay at.  This location had everything I wanted and even if I was missing something David was very responsive to any requests.  I would recommend this location to any of my friends and family.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: Sovay was very kind and quite welcoming. I had a peaceful relaxing time staying in her cute little bungalow. Comfy bed fluffy towels lovely sunlight a clean kitchen with pretty stained glass windows even fresh fruit in the fridge! It is also walking distance to the Green Muse (one of my favorite coffee shops) which is quite nice. I felt well taken care of.

Great hosts! Very friendly and welcoming. Provided everything we possibly could have needed and more for our stay. The cottage was cute cozy and made us feel like we were right at home. We would definitely stay here again!
Lynne was a gracious hostess - the condo is compact but had everything we needed.  It's a few minutes' walk to Barton Springs pool and close to all the things we wanted to do in Austin.

Drew was a fantastic host!  Very kind generous and helpful.  He was always available to answer questions and give advise. 

The space was clean modern and organized.  Exactly like the photos.  

Overall an excellent experience.

Loved the chickens!
We had a wonderful time at Lois's guesthouse. The location was great. We were close to downtown but still able to enjoy the Austin local spots. We hope to come back and stay again.

Great little house in a wonderful central location. Took a morning run through the Bouldin Creek greenbelt then walked 1 block for my morning latte. Also checked out her neighborhood sustainable library an enviromental science experiment/lab.

Very good host  highly recommended.

I highly recommend staying at Sara's cottage! It's centrally located and in a great neighborhood. My friend Kate and I had plenty of space inside the cozy cottage. Sara was full of restaurant recommendations too. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

Lester was a great host! So friendly and gracious...made me feel so welcome since day one and acted more like an old friend than a host. Cute place it really is just a block or two away from all the action here in Austin.
listing_name: SOCO One private room in a 2B house

comments: Lynne's condo was very homely and welcoming. Great location to everything downtown barton spring. She went the extra mile to give us suggestions of places to dine live music venues it was very helpful! I will definitely stay here again when visiting Austin everything you need is there to make your stay comfortable! I highly recommend her place!

My Mother and I had a wonderful stay at Sovay's! The house was super cute and had so much character. She really makes you feel at home and makes you feel as if you rented her whole house not just a room. She showed me how to make an awesome cup of cappuccino which was a real treat! The location is also ideal! My Mom and I walked to the Capital Barton Springs and to Chuy's for their happy hour :-). My boyfriend and little doggy came at the last minute and Sovay was more than accomidating.

He house was amazing there were two pools and local grocery stores were really close. I had an very enjoyable visit and I also enjoyed the treats that hope made they were very yummy! I would def visit again

Sylvia was a wonderful host!!  The place was cute and very comfortable.  We were in walking distance to almost all the locations we wanted to see during our stay.  We would definitely stay here again!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Sevylla provides a fantastic home away from home.  The room has such charm and enough space to really feel like you have your own place.  The neighbourhood is lovely super easy to get in and out of town and plenty to do locally.  Sevylla is a wonderful host shares the little ins and out of the city welcomes you in perfectly and has a fabulous personality and family.  I can highly recommend staying in the studio.

Charming place and it's like having your own whole house -- except that you don't have to shop for condiments coffee tea etc. those have been placed there by a fairy as have toiletries and other useful items.

Very comfortable has character great to be so near Barton Springs. Sovay is very nice and I'd recommend this to anyone and will return.
I had a great time in the It-Z bit-Z Bungalow.  it was exactly what I needed. Thank you Sovay for everything!
Everything was great great location
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: First of all the greatness of this space can't be justified in words or pictures. Kevin and his partner have truly good style and after a long journey it was a wonderful spot to make home for the night. The flat is clean private quiet and very cool despite the 107 degree heat that persisted throughout our visit. Kevin is a class act guy too and I would definitely recommend staying at his place if you want a comfortable awesomely decorated apartment in a perfect Austin location.

Marcus is a wonderful host.  He is very accomodating and  I would highly reccomend his Cool Hyde Park Effeciency to anyone.  One morning he delivered clean towels and a mini cherry pie.  What more could you ask for?  His place is very clean and has everything you need including Austin charm.  The neighborhood is one of the best in town and you are no more than 15 minutes from anywhere in Austin.
I give Marcus and his Cool Hyde Park Efficiency two thumbs up!!

I stayed with three friends at Lois's place this weekend.  We had a great stay.  The loft was both unique as well as comfortable and clean.  Staying at the loft really added to my Austin experience.  There are few other cities in the world where you will find a place to stay like this one!

So we went to Austin on Friday night and had to find a place last minute. Lester contacted me over the standby list (great feature!!!) and we made a deal immediately. We got to Austin around 11:00pm which must have been inconvenient for our host but he didn't complain at all. Our room was made up and ready! We were very pleased with our stay and will probably stay with Lester again whenever we will come to Austin again.
He is a very interesting person and can give you great tips to find your way around Austin if you ask him!
listing_name: SOCO One private room in a 2B house

comments: Elizabeth and David are the best!  My six-week stay in Austin would not have been the same without them.  Not only was the entire house (bathroom and room included) clean and lovely but Elizabeth and David really know Austin.  They made my stay incredibly enjoyable and were just delightful!  I would recommend this room to anyone who needs to stay in Austin for any length of time.

As another guest's review said staying at Sovay's was *quite* like suddenly having my own comfy house in a perfect Austin location. Useful items are thoughtfully placed around the house in case they're needed all the furnishings are cute comfortable and of high quality. I did LOTS of Austin exploring and so didn't actually see Sovay until my last day but she was very sweet and a perfect host. :)

The whole experience at Marcus' place was great. His place is amazing very comfortable and we had plenty of privacy. Marcus was also super friendly. Although we were late by over an hour he allowed us to go into the apartment while he ran an errand. We had everything we needed from towels toilet paper to extra pillows.

Lester is a very chill down to earth guy. His place: a good location next to all the coolness that south congress has to offer. Though I had a car you could stay here without one and probably still have a great time. Oh and if you're into mopeds Lester can hook you up. Two thumbs up!
listing_name: SOCO One private room in a 2B house

comments: My mother and sister stayed here during a weekend visit to Austin. The place was very clean and comfortable and the host was great to work with. I'll definitely have visitors stay here in the future.

Spent two days at Drew's while in Austin.  Very comfortable studio with great air conditioning (important when it is 105 outside).  It was quiet and great for sleeping in a bit and also we didn't have to worry about bothering anyone else as the studio is separate from the house.  Drew checked in with me by phone twice on the day I was due to arrive to make sure I knew how to get in and that I would be comfortable during my stay.  Will stay again--in fact tried to on my return but he was already booked.

The suite is cosy comfy and clean. Sovay thought of everything a guest could need. The neighbour isquiet and near to downtown. If you don't have a car the bus stops very nearby. Sovay was also very nice and hospitable. I had an excellent stay and would recommend this suite to anyone traveling to Austin

Sovay has done a wonderful job in creating a cozy place to stay right in the heart of Austin.  The bed is fantastically comfortable for starters.  It's plenty big for two people and there's lots of closet space and space in the bathroom to "move in" and get settled while you are there.  Plus the location is pretty fantastic - you are walking distance to Polvo's AND Once Over Coffee - some of the best Tex-Mex and THE best coffee in Austin.  We will absolutely stay here again!
Our stay was too short but Marcus' place was just perfect.
The apartment is great and is so close to everything downtown. Sylvia is awesome and very nice she even invited me over for dinner one night.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: The place was private and comfortable and the back yard is even more beautiful than pictures can give it justice. The apartment had a toaster oven and a mini fridge for our convenience and he even stocked the fridge with drinks and snacks (there was also a beautiful bowl of fruit waiting for us in the room)! We didn't know that layout of Austin all that well beforehand and we were happy to find that it was close to a ton of great restaurants shops and bars. And Dan was the perfect host - friendly helpful and frequently checking up on us to make sure we were happy with our stay (but in a way that still respected our privacy). I'll definitely recommend this place to friends and family!

I had a wonderful experience in Sovay's condo! She was super sweet easy to get a hold of and made our trip great! Her condo was clean spacious adorable and close to downtown. I'd recommend anyone to stay  here!
We couldn't have found a better place.  We stayed a whole week and having our own studio made traveling with a child GREAT.  Sevylla is extremely helpful and we loved the artsy feel to the studio.

The apartment is really fabulous. It is exactly as described and so is the neighborhood. I liked the view of the trees from the bedroom window! I would totally recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Austin short or long term! Angele is also very nice and helpful.
The accomodations were quite comfortable and Viviane and Michael were excellent hosts. Very friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay with them again.

This was a great place to stay in Austin awesome coffeeshop within walking distance and nearby all sorts of great eastside restraunts. Will definitely stay at the cottage again on my next trip to austin!

We really enjoyed our stay at Sovay's property. The living space was clean spacious and comfortable for our needs. We found the location to be quiet yet well positioned for local amenities and easily accessible for downtown.

Sovay is a great host friendly hospitable and with a wealth of local knowledge. 

Were happy to recommend.

Andy and Ellen were excellent hosts.

The guest home was really easy to check into and was appropriately cooled for the Texas weather when we got there. One of the best things about staying in the unit was the fact that almost everything I could think of had been taken care of. We had a place to park bikes to use internet access and even some fresh fruit in the fridge which really helped take the edge off of arriving. We had tons of privacy  If I even come back to Austin I will unquestionably check if I can stay here first.

Lisa is GREAT! The condo is AMAZING! Great location very clean very accomodating and Lisa is super nice friendly and willing to work with you. Highly recommend staying here! I will definitely be booking with Lisa again!

We were so pleased with our stay at the Zilker Park Condo in Austin. This was our first time using airbnb and we are officially converts.  Lynne was an excellent host.  She was super responsive sent us all kinds of helpful info. and had all kinds of tea and coffee (with fresh milk) waiting for us.  The condo itself was clean and comfy and we even got some good design ideas for our own house!  The location was ideal.  We were close to everything and were able to avoid traffic.  We will definitely look to stay here again and highly recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay in Austin.

Just PERFECT! Really. You can stop looking now----you found THE place to stay in Austin. Drew and Simone are great hosts the apartment is seriously cute clean and comfy and the neighborhood is wonderful! My husband and I would definitely stay there again! :)
Lois has a funky place giving off mellow laid-back vibes and she is a nice host! Make sure you get a look at her car when you visit she really is keeping Austin weird.

Sovey was awesome! My girfriend and I stayed in Sovey's house for 6 days while I found an apartment in Austin. Sovey made sure we were always okay and even stopped by on my first day to town  to make sure I was settling in nicely. Her home was so cute and clean + it was the perfect amount of space for my friend and I. We were able to use the kitchen for breakfast and lunch + watch movies on her huge tv screen while we lounged in her comfy bed! I highly recommend her space to anyone. It's so close to the city and Gourdough's(the best donuts I've ever eaten!)

Kelly and her family are absolutely lovely and we had a wonderful visit in their cottage. It is very clean and beautifully decorated with an elligant simple style with no clutter. It is a wonderful space to be in and a perfect central location. Kelly was always available and very thoughtful. The night of our arrival she offered to have the sofa bed ready for our kids since we would be late. We would certainly stay there again.
Adrienne

This adorable house is in a perfect location with lots of privacy.  The room and bathroom had everything we needed.  The living room and porch are cozy too.  Sovay was highly responsive and took the time to make some helpful recommendations for us.

My stay with at Andy Simmonsƒ?? private cottage was wonderful. It was private and yet I felt like I could reach out and ƒ??say heyƒ?? if necessary or if I had questions or wanted ƒ??intelƒ?? on good places to eat or visit. Some nice touches were:
-	The cottage had lots of ƒ??Austin historyƒ?? memorabilia which was fun to explore
-	The stereo had an i-phone docking station.
-	The fridge was stocked with great breakfast snack beverage items.

Their cottage made me feel at home- a big plus when traveling.

My husband baby and myself came to Austin for a 5 month temporary relocation. As a mother I can only tell you that our decision to stay at Mary's place was the best and not only because the home is pristine and it looks exactly as the pictures but also because of her owner Mary. Her thoughtfulness her small details around the house and her interest about our well being were there all the time. She even left cookies for our little son which he devoured together with my husband. I could not have felt more at home in her little cottage. I highly appreciate her helping us adjusting to our new temporary life. Thanks so much. I hope to see her soon.

I can echo the other positive reviews. My wife and I just stayed at Sovay's Bungalow and with 105 degree weather we really appreciated both the air conditioner and having a fridge in which we could keep cold drinks.  Very clean and good location. We made great use of Torchy's Tacos (2 min drive up the street) and the heart of south congress is walkable or a very reasonable cab ride. 

Also really appreciated Sovay's list of suggested things to see and do in Austin.

Sylvia was a fantastic host and her accommodation was great. It had everything we needed and was very comfortable. There is a separate entrance so we were able to come and go as we pleased without bothering Sylvia. Sylvia's place is walking distance from Downtown but if the heat gets too much there is a bus stop that goes to Downtown just a few minutes walk away. I highly recommend Sylvia and her apartment I would definitely stay with her again next time I'm in Austin.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Although we never actually met Susan she was very nice and accommodating via e-mail and text and the house was perfect for what we needed!  She even left us a fresh pitcher of tea in the fridge.  Great location clean comfortable - highly recommend this Bungalow!

Great location and much better than a hotel - especially the parking.  Marcus was easy to reach and kept us updated with texts.  Very cute place very comfortable.  Great coffee too!  Will stay here again!

Kelly & her family were great hosts!
They made our 3 night stay very comfortable.
The cottage is adorable & equipped with everything you need.
It is also very quite & the view of all the old oak trees from the
windows are beautiful!
My 4year old nephew had a blast in the treehouse. 
I highly recommend this cozy cottage!

Cute place in an awesome location!! Loved the two nights I spent there and look forward to returning some day! I am from Austin so I can gaurantee this is a great central location. Everything was as promised by Sylvia and the tub was a nice bonus for soaking in! :)
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Very cute and nicely decorated place; clean and quiet.  Sovay was very good about following up on my questions and ensuring that everthing was well taken care of.  Thanks for the excellent hospitality!
Drew was wonderful.  Very accommodating and friendly.  Pointed me in the direction of some great attractions and venues.  Would highly recommend to anyone.

Lester was a really great guy so friendly and helpful and very accommodating. He booked us via the standby feature and was really patient with our rapidly changing plans. He knew heaps about Austin and even got us into a concert for free. He also offered to drive us around if we wanted. The place was a bit messy but a fantastic location just a few blocks from all the tasty restaurants and food stands of SoCo and the quirky shops.
listing_name: SOCO One private room in a 2B house

comments: We stayed with Elizabeth and David for three weeks when we moved to Austin. They were wonderful hosts! We loved staying with them and would recommend them to anyone. The only downside is that it takes about 20-25 minutes to get into downtown Austin so we were driving quite a bit.

It's a great place.  In Sylvia's backyard she has a small free-standing cottage.  It's small but quite cozy and her house is very close to downtown Austin.  Quite convenient.  Sylvia was extremely helpful and even let us park our car (which was holding all of our personal belongings at the time) in her driveway hidden from the view of the street.  Recommend highly!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Angele's condo is clean well-appointed and comfortable. I would definitely return and recommend her without reservation.

This space was just what we needed: peaceful clean quiet private and comfortable! I was able to meditate and watch birds in the back yard. Lois is a fun laid-back informative and gracious hostess. 

There were PILES of pillows and plenty of sheets and towels. The four of us slept comfortably on the three non-framed futon mattresses. I took the loft as the most agile of the bunch. My friends were a little scared of the steep stairs with offset steps because of their ankle and knee issues. 

The lack of kitchen amenities was not a problem because I'm a fan of Flipnotics Coffeehouse which is just down the street. I would definitely stay here again. It's the perfect peaceful crash pad and it's close to everything!
This little bungalow is superb.  Plenty of space nicely furnished and in a hip part of town.  Sovay is a gracious hostess.  I am definitely staying here again if I come to Austin.
Marcus was a really great host! He was happy to help and everything went really smoothly. Thanks!

My beau and I loved our stay at Angele's. Very clean well-designed and just minutes from whole foods 6th st and congress st. you can definitely walk (or drive) right downtown to enjoy alllll of austin! There's even coffee in the freezer for you to enjoy!

charming studio with everything you need right there bus service a block away and a gracious host--even though we mostly connected via text and phone during my 4 day visit sevylla could not have been more helpful. I'd stay here again anytime.

Sovay was a great host. I had everything I needed for a great stay in Austin including much needed air-conditioning as it was extremely hot. The bed was also amazing!
Sovay provided heaps of information about Austin including a map and was even nice enough to give me a ride to South Congress one day.

We had a wonderful stay! Andy and Ellen were great hosts offering a lovely cottage stocked with great food and books. The bikes were a fun way to explore Austin and Andy's help with navigation was exceptional. Wish we could have a place like this to stay everywhere we went.

This is a really great place to stay. Kelly was a wonderful hostess and very accommodating. (In my eyes anyone who will let my kiddo get his hands on a sprinkler is a winner.)

This was just the right size for four of us with just the right amenities. We really enjoyed it and will definitely come back when we return to Austin.

I should also mention Austin has really developed a lot in the last few years meaning it's difficult to get anywhere without hitting traffic. This place was in the perfect spot for us to get exactly where we needed to be (downtown/Barton Springs/etc.) without hitting any traffic jams!

Amazing hosts! The place was quiet and very clean and within walking distance to anything you would want to do in downtown Austin. Michael and Stephanie were very helpful and friendly -- Thanks for the great stay!

I had a wonderful relaxing time staying at the Tower Suite.  Michael & Viviane were both very hospitable and helpful from the beginning to the end of visit. They are located only blocks away from SOCO and downtown Austin. I definitely recommend them and their cool home to all making a visit to Austin.
listing_name: Tower Suite - Fab in central Austin

comments: See my other review... perfect place to stay and Sovay accommodated me for an extra night at the last minute
This is our second time to stay with Sovay and we will definitely do it again!  We love it there. :)  See my first review for details.   Highly recommended!!!!

We had an awesome vacation at Bill & Melissa's perfect loft. They were very kind & helpful if we had any questions. The space is great for a relaxing getaway from everything and we loved watching birds squirrels and even saw a baby bunny from the deck while enjoying our morning coffee. The tub is HEAVENLY the kitchen is sufficient to cook full meals the views are beautiful and the Hornungs are wonderful hosts. We will (and have already) recommended the loft to friends and hope to make it a part of our vacations in the years to come. 
Thanks again Bill & Melissa!

We had a lovely stay at David's condo.  Both David & Julia were so friendly and went out of their way to make our stay enjoyable and comfortable.  

We fell in love with Austin & this was a great place to do so.  There were such beautiful views of the city from their dock on the lake where we watched the sunset.  We took a nice sunset cruise one night to see the bats & we enjoyed a bottle of wine David had left for us.  We also rented stand-up paddle boats around the corner from their place.  Great way to enjoy the lake and city.

David was a great host & we will probably be back to Austin soon and would definitely stay here again.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: Well this was our first time using airbnb and visiting Austin so we were not sure what to expect.  When we got there the place was even more beautiful then it looked in the pictures and was very neat and clean. The flat had everything you need and then some as well as some cool extra amenities (love pandora & netflix) The location was perfect as well and made getting everywhere we wanted to go very easy.  Drew gave us a full tour of the place and even was kind enough to give us some advice on where to find some good markets restaurants shopping swimming pools and etc.  Drew and Simone were very gracious hosts and we enjoyed our stay there very much.  Simone even babysat our baby girl one night while me and the wife enjoyed a romantic dinner and a few drinks which was really cool.   When we return to Austin we would not think of staying anywhere else.

Alyson is very warm and welcoming.  She has so much knowledge about places to go in Austin and she provided us with relevant information and maps for our Austin adventures. Alyson was so accommodating and willing to work with my group's plans...even with some last minute changes.

Her space was very relaxing and peaceful! It was in such a beautiful (email hidden) friends and I were shocked.  I would recommend her space to anyone looking for a location that is relaxing beautiful and close to downtown Austin and Zilker Park.  Don't let her beautiful space pass you by!
Very cozy and comfortable place. Futons were actually quite comfortable. Location was great.

The pictures do not do this gorgeous charming and intimate apartment justice. The apartment's layout and furnishings are straight from a magazine yet inviting and cozy. There were interesting books and artifacts in every nook but the decorations did not overwhelm the space only emphasize its spaciousness. The bathroom was stocked with many great-smelling goodies (shampoos soaps etc.) and Kevin left elegant white towels for us. Although my friend and I had planned to spend an evening out on the town we preferred to stay at the apartment to read late into the evening and then wake early to share tea in the incredible sun room. 

It was extremely convenient to all things to do Austin and easy to find upon arrival; the neighborhood was very pleasant and the bed was extremely comfortable. Add to that the hosts quick and easy communication -- for what more can you ask!  

The only problem with this place is that I didn't want to leave! A great stay and I hope for the chance to visit again.

Lisa`s condo was our home in Austin! Both the Condo and the location are wonderful! It`s close to everything you need to visit in Austin! Lisa is very kind and a great host! If we come back to Austin we will definitely stay at Lisa`s Condo! Tip: If you come from Argentina don`t forget to bring a bottle of red wine for her!
We had such a nice time in Austin at Susan's house.  It's a perfect location for all those cool South Austin places you must see while there.   We would definitely stay there again!

Katherine was a delight to deal with.  The house is very comfortable and was all clean and ready for us when we arrived.  It is located in a quiet residential area but conveniently close to all the neat shops and restaurants in SoCo. It is also a short cab ride over the bridge to downtown. We had a great time.

Thanks
Owen

Lovely apartment - lovely host & hostess!   This little apartment was sparkling clean quality bed to sleep on and extremely private and quiet.  Good quality linens on bed and in bathroom.  Not only would we stay with Kelly again we would recommend this place highly to any of our friends.  Especially liked the Old West Austin/Tarrytown location.  Beautiful tree-lined streets that made walking in the morning such a pleasure.  Great value- great location- great hosts - just great!
Linda and Mark
