Jaime and Mike are pleasant hosts.  The guest house is cute (very hip to Austin culture) and clean and offers plenty of space for a single person or a couple as ourselves.  There is plenty of privacy as the guest house is completely separate from the hosts' home.  This house is in a residential area and in a safe neighborhood.  It is easy to find and to get to.  There is limited parking on the street and in the driveway so opt to bring a smaller vehicle so that you can maneuver around more easily.  Great location within walking or biking distance of several great Austin eateries and venues.  Off Lamar and near Barton Springs and the Greenbelt.  Excellent homey stay.  The price is right.  No hesitation to book it again in the future.  Had a great time thank you guys!

Amy and family were wonderful hosts! The house was the perfect location for exploring Austin. My husband and I walked almost everywhere and especially enjoyed the proximity to Zilker Park. Everything was very clean and wonderful decorated all the comforts of home. The apartment was much more than we expected and for a very fair price. I will keep Amy in mind the next time we travel to Austin!
Great people.  Great stay. Great experience.  This was our second time to stay there and its our new favorite place.  It is centrally located and has many perks that are provided by the owner.

Perfect place to stay and we would definitely stay again if we get the chance. The place was clean tasteful and felt very homelike. We were thrilled with the location and Host. The room is airy and light and was super relaxing place to lounge. We played in the fort sipped a Shiner on the roof deck with the trees in the breeze and visited with host and his fam. It was all around a great experience and we would recommend it to anyone who is a nice person and wants a nice place to stay. we definitely did not want to leave! Really can't say enough good about it.

My boyfriend and I had an absolutely wonderful time staying w/ Elizabeth.  Not only was she incredibly nice warm and welcoming but she also went out of her way to compile a list of great places to check out in the area for us.  The house was nice and clean and the bed was one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept on - not kidding!!  We would absolutely stay there again in a heartbeat!
Great place convenient location super friendly host!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: What a perfect place! Immaculate and was everything we needed for a great weekend! Mary was excellent at communicating everything and we had zero issues. We loved all the little extras she provided as well. I would recommend it to everyone!
This condo was adorable and definitely fit our needs. Everything was very clean and Lynne was very accomodating anf helpful. i would definitely stay here again.

David is a conscientious host who welcomed us warmly and even provided some refreshments in the fridge! The interior of the condo is lovely and the location on the lake and running trail is fantastic. We loved our stay here and I would recommend the place to anyone.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments:
There is no doubt in our minds on how Drew has attained the coveted "Superhost" rating. Here is a list of why:
1. Drew is a natural when it comes to hosting and making someone feel welcome.
2. They have a great little nook above their garage that they make feel like home to the wondering traveler.
3. Drew offers little tidbits on where to go what to eat etc; which they all check out as great advice. What is also great is he is not pushy with these suggestions.
4. The location is perfect for someone wanting to unwind or just the opposite someone who wants to get caught up in the buzz of the ƒ??localƒ? Hyde Park area. You pick.
5. You are free to come and go as you please and Drew is willing to work with you when it comes to check in and check out. 
6. Drew and his family have a sustainable future in mind and they walk the talk. This coexists exactly with their neighborhood and surrounding area (Austin only). 
We hope this review helps to bring more people to Drewƒ??s little slice of Austin. 
Drew- sorry for the lateness of the review.

Sovay was a very gracious host =). Her home is beautifully decorated and in the PERFECT location ($7 taxi to downtown and you can walk to entertainment and dining in SoCo). The bed is SUPER comfortable and it was a plus having a television in the room (if you're a single traveler). Though I wound up eating out much the kitchen is perfect for preparing meals. I would definitely stay again =)
The host canceled my reservation 21 days before arrival.

My first time using Airbnb could not have been a better experience! The condo is well represented in the pictures and is clean and spacious. There location was perfect being only a 10 minute walk (or 8 minutes at my speedy pace) to Whole Foods and easily accessible to downtown. Perfect for my boyfriend and I over his birthday weekend. Angele was the perfect hostess contacting me prior to my arrival and insuring that every need we had was met. I'll be back in Austin in 30 days and sadly this place isn't available but if it were I'd scoop it up in a heartbeat and plan to any of my Austin trips that I need a place to stay. :-)
Beautiful apartment. Great accommodations. The bed was so comfortable. Loved the kitchen arrangement. Would recommend this to anyone for the future!
Great accommodations with a awesome location and thoughtful host.  Walking distance to Barton Springs downtown great restaurants  coffee and other Austin landmarks.
Great location Warm hospitality Comfortable place and located in a great part of Austin. I  would truly recommend that you consider staying with Susan  and family.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: I CANNOT SAY ENOUGH GOOD THINGS ABOUT SOVAY. HER PLACE IS BEAUTIFUL AND IMPECCABLE.

We had a wonderful stay at Marcus's place.  It's nice and interesting unit in a great neighborhood that's very close to UT and downtown Austin.  Marcus was a great and helpful host that provided clean linens extra bedding and tasty snacks!
Staying at the cottage was very pleasant and located very close to the downtown/south Austin area we were visiting. Very private clean well stocked a great value for the price.

This was a great place to stay!  The place is clean and has everything you'd need for a short or longer-term stay.  It's in a good location in a nice neighborhood close to I-35 and downtown.  Karen was very welcoming and friendly.

Fiona was very communicative and helpful during the check in process which was really very easy.  The cottage is in a great location super close to many bars and my favorite food truck in Austin :) It's a quaint little studio cottage with plenty of space.  Only things to note are that there are no doors not even to the bathroom (separated with a curtain).  So it's a good place for 1 person or perhaps a couple.  It's definitely got the artsy Austin feel to it which is awesome.  Thanks Fiona!

We couldn't have asked for a better first airbnb experience!  The cottage was a perfect home-away-from-home for the week.  We didn't get a chance to meet Sara but did get to meet her husband Travis.  He was super accommodating and friendly.  Their dog Cash is a sweetheart.  Thank you!
Great location great price nice quiet neighborhood; I enjoyed my stay.

Drew has this airbnb thing down to an art. The apartment is really lovely! Very very clean cute and well maintained. We were welcomed when we arrived and given a quick intro to Austin. We happily accepted the bottle of wine and the bar of dark chocolate that were left for us. 

They thought of just about everything here. Bug spray body wash and even on-site yoga and massage. We got plenty of towels to use. Both indoor and outdoor!  The A/C works quite well (we were there in 95 - 100 degree weather) and there's lots of natural light. The wifi was great and there was a flat screen TV (which we never turned on so cannot comment on). What is especially nice about this spot is that you are not directly above or below the host. The apartment is located above a garage which is separate from the host's house so you have a great deal of privacy which we enjoy.

We are moving to Austin soon and were very lucky to stay with someone who was so open to helping us think about neighborhoods the housing market etc ....

We couldn't have imagined a better airbnb experience!
Unique and fun decor.  Clean and comfortable. Conveniently located near downtown and UT. Lois was helpful and kind.

My first visit to Austin and it was fabulous.  I loved the quaint little guest house it was super convenient to most of Austin and our hosts were very nice as well.  This is where I'll be staying on all of my weekend trips to Austin now!
Sylvia is a really nice person and a great host.  She made us feel very welcome and her place had all the amenities for a very comfortable stay.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Drew was fantastic!  He had a lot of great local information when we got there for a weekend trip.  There was plenty of room and was very quiet.  It was 3 blocks to the bus system - for $1 you can get into Austin in 8 minutes.  Overall a fantastic option to stay close to the city.

Loved staying here.  Really cute and comfortable cottage in a convenient location (at least if you have a car--it sounded like there were bus stations nearby and there were a few restaurants you could walk to but in general it seemed more ideal if you could drive).  

Mary was communicative and extremely easy to get ahold of and her place was lovely!  She thoughtfully left us some juice and English muffins and a list of her favorite places nearby.  We ate at one Habanero's for breakfast tacos and it was fantastic.  And just a five-minute walk from the cottage!

We especially enjoyed sitting on the patio in the backyard at night under the lights.  Would definitely stay here again if I were ever to return to Austin and would highly recommend to others as well!

Staying at Sovay's was an absolute delight!  The house was not just clean and lovely but also comfortable - I felt at home right away!  It was easy to walk through the neighborhood to coffee shops lots of food options and downtown (though it was very hot out when I was there!)

Lester Chiu was probably the best host I could ever ask for. He was more than a host - he was a friend a confidant.... and he was cool. That's quite a trio. 

Our trip would have been NOTHING without him.

Lester I heart you.
listing_name: SOCO One private room in a 2B house

comments: I can't put i words the cool experience we had staying info the loft. We were able to cook gourmet meals and eat on the patio.. The view of  downtown was great. I will be staying again. Thanks first the wonderful experience
Great place.  Very friendly host.
Just what I was looking for: clean quiet safe great location and host. I'll be back.
Sylvia is extremely friendly and inviting. The apartment is quiet comfortable clean and fully stocked with everything you might need. Not much more to say... it was easy and stress free.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Scott's house is so cool. Very Austin chic. Great spot to come back to after a night on the town at 6th street.
listing_name: Fun East Austin Home for ACL SXSW!

comments:
Michele was such a lovely hostess! She not only offered to pick me up at the Airport but she was sweet enough to make a special trip to the grocery store so I could get everything I needed for the weekend! Her outdoor shower can't be matched and the colorful whimsy that is her house made me feel right at home.
I can't wait to stay with her again!

Thank you MIchele!

We had a wonderful time staying at Jenny's House she is a wonderful person and the house is pretty comfotable and beautiful.
i would rate this as an EXCELLENT experience.

5 STARS!!  Scott and his family shared their beautiful home with us on ACL weekend.  The photos really don't do it justice.  They made every effort to communicate with us before our stay ensuring that all of our needs were taken care of.  Upon arrival the house was clean common areas were very conducive to hanging out and all the sleeping areas were comfortable.  They left us tasty snacks and drinks in the fridge.  The location is great; only about a mile walk to Zilker Park.  Everyone in our group loved this place and we are already talking about renting again if available in the future!
listing_name: 4 BDR Home Ideal for SXSW F1 ACL

comments: Not only was Ray's home immaculate but Ray was an awesome hostess as well!  She was very pleasant to communicate with. Overall it was a wonderful trip. I strongly recommend this home to anybody visiting Austin.

This was such a lovely cottage to stay in I did not want to leave! All the small details to make this a memorable stay made this a cottage a would recommend to anyone! The fridge was stocked to our hearts content and it even had a few cold beers waiting for us! We went there mainly for the ACL music festival but felt sad to leave each morning because we actually wanted to enjoy the cottage as much as we could! Slept on the most comfortable futon ever! Took more photos of the decor inside the cottage than anything else! Will never stay inside another hotel in Austin; the Central Cottage is where it's at!!

Marcus was great! The space was awesome close to downtown Austin and Marcus was a wonderful and helpful host! 

I would absolutely stay again.

Elizabeth was great and her place was lovely! She worked with me to get the keys to us even though she was working downtown when we arrived. The room was clean and she provided everything we needed. Our whole stay was stress free and worry free and nothing went wrong. It really helped our whole experience with ACL since so much was going on at the festival. It was nice to come back to Elizabeth's and not have to worry. Thank you thank you!

Dhoi and her husband Arup are great hosts. I was their first guest during ACL 2011 and can recommend to stay with them! They were very helpful when I had problems with the Wifi but it worked with the cable. Dhoi went with me to the grocery store and offered me everything I could wish for. Location is perfect the bus stop coming from downtown is in front of the apartment complex. If you are a good walker you can walk to Zilker Park/ACL across Mopac Foot Bridge.

We had a lovely stay with Lin.  Her ranch though very conveniently located (within ten minutes of South Congress and fifteen of downtown Austin) is a very relaxing peaceful setting.  My husband and I look forward to staying with her again.

As a host Tyler was very friendly and welcoming on my stay at his place for ACL weekend.  He worked with my work schedule to find a time when I could get settled into his place which I appreciated.  He even looked up the bus route I needed for me.  The location was well located for exploring south Austin.

Sadly Tyler is new to Airbnb hosting and there were some kinks to my stay.  The bathroom hadn't been cleaned and wasn't cleaned over the course of my stay.  It had a lot of hairs shaving bits and laundry on the floors and counter and a dirty bathtub.  The bed in the bedroom was comfortable but a portion of it sagged so that if you were in bed with another person and were near the edge you had to be careful not to roll out.  He could have also tidied up more of his personal items in his room since there was laundry out on the door knob and stuff falling out of the closet.  

When I mentioned the positives and negatives to Tyler he was very receptive to making changes for the future.  I think this place has potential to be an even better experience for those staying at this affordable well located place in the future!
listing_name: South Austin Aptmnt Room for rent

comments: Great place to stay! We stayed during the ACL Music Festival this past weekend and this condo was so convienient! It has a very "homey" feeling and it was only a short walk away from the park! I was able to meet Lynne the day we checked in and she is the sweetest lady! She had everything ready for us and we couldnt have stayed at a better place! :)

Great accomodations and great host.  The place was extremely comfortable!  Drew was very helpful with everything from restaurants to  airport transportation.  Even had a great recommendation for a masseuse.  Will definitely come and stay again next time I am in Austin.

Alyson was a fantastic host!  Her home was warm and welcoming and she was more than happy to help us nurse our ACL injuries back to health.  Anytime I go to Austin I will always check with Alyson first before checking with any hotels.

My friend Paul and I stayed here for ACL 2011 and this place was nothing short of incredible. This little bungalow is tastefully decorated quite affordable with all new appliances and impeccably cleaned. We had a fantastic time staying here as it was convenient to get to ACL and the downtown scene. Edie and Alberto also provided their bikes for the weekend as part of the deal with an additional deposit - this was huge in terms of not having to negotiate traffic and parking for ACL. I would HIGHLY recommend this place if you are a clean classy festival goer looking for a place with a little taste of old Austin. The bike ride after dark along the river in not for the faint of heart. However... it is by far the most convenient way to get around during ACL.

The cottage is absolutely adorable spacious and clean.  And I must agree that the shower was great! Very private and in a great easy location.  We brought our own bikes and found no problem to bike into town or to Zilker Park.  The coffee shop up the street is great for a quick bite. Would definitely recommend this place!

Our stay in Austin was awesome!  Dan is a wonderful host.  His rental unit is clean very comfortable.  The back yard is an eclectic mix of plants Koi pond and small bubbling fountains.  There are many different Mexican tiles and small figurines.  It is a quiet place to read or just relax.
As a host Dan is warm and friendly.  We were greeted with fruit crackers and cheese and bottled water (a necessity in the Austin area).  We had wonderful conversations about history politics and of course music!
Dan recommended several great restaurants and a trip to South Congress (clothing shops antiques and eats) was wonderful!  Dan helped us maneuver around with public transit.
We truly felt like family members during our stay.  We're hoping to return to Austin (without an ACL festival) to enjoy more of this city and have another visit with Dan.

Becca is an amazing host with an amazing house!  From start to finish our stay was perfect.  

Amazing location perfect accommodation amazing city!!

Thank you so much!
Sydney provided us with all the extras that we would not have expected. It was a fantastic experience!

Ashley was such a wonderful & thoughtful host.  My friend and I drove up to Austin to attend a photography conference and she gave us great advice on where to find the best coffee and dinner in the area.  Her bungalow was charming clean and comfortable.  The patio in the back was decorated with string lights - perfect place for sitting out with a glass of wine.  I would love to stay here again the next time I'm in Austin and would highly recommend it to any of my friends.
listing_name: FAB 2 bDR where Airbnb CEO stays!

comments:
A fantastic experience!

My fiancee and I travelled to Austin to attend the ACL music festival and found Susan's place to be perfect for getting to and from the festival at Zilker park. Located in a quiet by accessible neighbourhood this place is only a stone's throw from everything Austin offers. Not to mention Susan is a spectacular host!

Not only did Susan have everything arranged for us including pedal bikes but we were also given tons of information regarding the Austin area. Also fresh bottles of water were waiting for us in the fridge coffee was available air conditioning and a very comfy bed.

The place is located a little far from the downtown core but buses run frequently and with bikes the ride was only 25 mins. Also there is a great coffee shop down the road right next to the 'HULA HUT' which was an unbelievable place to grab some Tex-Mex eats/margaritas on the water.


I would not hesitate for a second to stay at Susan's again. She was the perfect host and the place was well kept! You couldn't ask for more...

Highly recommended!
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: We loved Renee's house and had a great stay.  It was in perfect condition when we arrived.  The property was better than described and the neighborhood was great.
Sovay and her place are perfect for a stay in Austin. It's like staying at an upscale hotel but with a cozy homestyle feel to it. I will definitely stay at her place again. Thanks Sovay!

Staying at Sevylla's was an excellent first airbnb experience! It was clean and cozy and Sevylla was a generous host. I used to live in Austin so I didn't need a lot of pointers for things to do but I know that Sevylla was ready with lots of ideas and information if I had needed them.

5th trip to Austin and hands down the best I've had yet. I have never stayed in the SOCO area before and I won't stay anywhere else again thanks to both Jill and the awesome neighborhood just outside the doors.

About Jill/the apt: What an amazing place to stay! The screened sleeping porch outdoor shower bagels coffee and bananas waiting for us - Jill was definitely a great host and the apartment was such a pleasure to stay in! She was so very helpful throughout out stay and her apartment is very comfortable.

About the neighborhood: We actually struggled getting to ACL every day because of how much there was to do. AMAZING shopping food coffee pizza bike rides - everything just outside the door!

I'll be back to Jill's place. Including for ACL next year so don't even try it :)

About the neighborhood.

What a wonderful time! Patty was such a gracious hostess! My best friend and I in Austin for the Austin City Limits Music Festival found her home spotlessly clean and inviting. Patty has two adorable dogs who weren't there during our stay but one would never know if not for their pictures on display. The photos posted on AirBnB fail to capture Patty's stylish flair but my best friend and I can attest to her home's lovely welcoming interior. 

Patty made available coffee and milk and encouraged us to help ourselves and went out of our way to ensure our stay was comfortable. She even left us a welcome gift and offered guidance on popular neighborhood dining spots!

I would gladly stay at Patty's home again. She's a lovely person and was a wonderful hostess who made our weekend most enjoyable. We're so grateful she chose to share her home with us.
listing_name: Cool South Central Home for rent

comments: Ashley was great very responsive and accommodating.  Her apartment is in a good location near downtown and close to popular spots like Medici Coffee and Galaxy Cafe two of our favorites.  The apartment is a nicely converted garage into apartment is comfortable has blaring A/C to combat Austin summer heat and a small outdoor shared yard area.  Our only complaint is a very small shower not an issue for most but at 6'4'' it was a struggle.  That said I would recommend Ashley and her apartment to others who aren't too tall :-)

The Moseley's were absolutely great hosts with an absolutely beautiful cottage!  We hope they will have us back! There is no reason whatsoever I would not recommend their gem of a cottage! Thanks again!
Dolina and her husband Yohan could not have been nicer.  I would recommend the birdhouse to anyone visiting Austin. It was such a pleasure!!
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments:
My fiance and I were in town for ACL and while we considered staying downtown chose to stay with Bill and Melissa south of downtown.

It turned out to be a great choice.  The loft is secluded and surrounded by trees.  Access to the rest of Austin is also easy since it is close to the freeways.  

The bed was plenty large and we cooked for a couple of nights.  Also the pictures are reflective of the place lots of sunlight and well decorated.  It was probably the best place I've stayed in the US so far.

Bill and Melissa were also very helpful - we locked ourselves out twice and it was no trouble at all.

Jason was an incredible host with a perfect home!  We were greeted with a six-pack of Shiner Bock beautiful hand-soaps for each person cool snacks and the local papers. He also left us with a detailed list of spots for dining shopping the local liquor store Austin favorites and much more. 
The house was so cute and accommodating for our group of seven!  The beds were comfy and all the rooms were well decorated.  It was fantastic starting each morning with French Pressed Coffee!  We loved spending time in the family room listening to the insane vinyl collection!  The location was in my personal favorite area of Austin (South Congress) and was a short easy walk to everything.  
We are usually very picky about where we stay.  We are huge fans of the Ace hotel and several other hip boutique places.  I would highly recommend Jason's home especially if you are traveling with friends but want the feel of a warm hip spot!
Thank you Jason for everything you did to make our stay incredible!

Perfect host and perfect place in Austin.  This was an amazing retreat after long work days at ACL.  Thanks to Robbie our stay was great.  The house is in impeccable shape the beds are super soft and comfortable and the neighborhood is very quiet and clean.

Wonderful place to stay great location.  Kristi went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and provided very helpful information for things to do/places to eat in Austin!

Would definitely stay there again and HIGHLY recommend!
listing_name: Cute Condo in Coolest Part of Town!

comments:
I came with 2 friends to Mary's lovely house for the ACL music festival. The house was spotless when we arrived. It has a great clean and modern yet comfortable aesthetic. Mary provided so many nice details like snacks in the fridge extra toothbrushes a great list of places to check out in the area a custom map showing us the route from the house to the festival...She was  really helpful with our planning for our stay before we arrived and very generous about check in and out times.  
Mary was also incredibly easy going and nice when we locked ourselves out of the house- she got back to us immediately and got us back in (it was our mistake).  The house is on a quiet street but really close to some fun places... we got around by bikes our whole stay- Austin is a great biking town.
I really can't say enough about how lovely our stay was and how great and perfect the house was and what a kind considerate airbnb host Mary is.

Tammy was a wonderful host!!!  We ended up getting in very late as we were at the ACL festival most of the day.  She got out of bed to show us the room and amenities even though it was about one in the morning.  I would have been cranky but she was nothing but nice.  Everything was wonderful the room was beautiful and the bathroom was spotless.  She recommended a place to eat breakfast the next day that was off the beaten path so that we wouldn't have to fight the ACL crowds and it was fabulous!  Her dog Scout was a sweetheart and the backyard was beautiful.  Overall a great experience and I would highly recommend it!
This place is great - the pool is really nice. David was a very helpful host answered all of our questions!
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: Lisa's condo was perfect and everything I needed for my stay in Austin.  The pictures and description of the place are all accurate and Lisa is really easy to work with and very accommodating.  I would definitely stay at Lisa's place again if in Austin.

My husband and I stayed at David's this weekend during ACL. This was our first time in Austin. When we arrived at David's loft we felt very welcome which is important when visiting a new city. His loft is very nice and modern. It's clean private and had everything we could have asked for. It's perfect for anyone searching for an affordable place with a convenient location. It was close to every hot spot we wanted to check out! There was so much to see and do we didn't know where to start!!! David was very friendly and helpful!! He made us feel right at home. I would recommend his loft to anyone! We plan to move to Austin early next year. Also next month (October) we plan on going back to Austin on vacation We would definitely stay at David's again. Why waste your money on a hotel when you could rent a place like this at such a great price?!?! Thanks David - The skylights are the cherry on top. We'll be in touch!

Dhoi and her husband were wonderful hosts! Friendly and willing to answer questions I had. I was in Austin to explore and for the ACL gig. When I arrived Dhoi and her husband kindly offered to drop me off as close to the entrance as possible and Dhoi drew me directions on how to get back!?ÿ

Location is a minute from the bars on Fifth Ave and approx. a 15 minute walk from Zilker Park. $6 from Sixth Street by cab (can be walked)

Nice neat accommodation :) No complaints!?ÿ

Thank you for your hospitality! :)?ÿ

Cozy clean house in a friendly and quiet neighborhood. A five minute walk will get you to a really nice breakfast cafe (Bouldin Creek on First) and five more will get you right onto South Congress). We loved our stay in this beautiful house.
Great place with a fantstic host. I had a great time in Austin!

We LOVED staying with Sylvia. The garage apartment is everything she advertises it to be...plus some lovely extras. She even has grass mats and beach towels for a trip to Lake Travis or Barton Springs!

Next time we come to Austin we are definitely staying here.

Wifi was good kitchen was stocked with tea and some coffee everything was very clean. Plenty of pillows! That's a big plus for me.

Thank you Sylvia!!!!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: The property was very well kept inside and warm.  It is ideal for a single person or couple.  Fiona is very communicative through every step of the process and was extremely hospitable.  She really knows the area well and gave great instructions and help evening giving me a ride. In addition it only took me about 20 mins or so to walk to the convention center and a cab from the location is only about $6.  I would totally stay there again.

I loved my stay in the Bungalow!  It was clean and calm respite from the heat of Texas the perfect place to come home to from my days at working at the office when I just wanted to relax and cook.  Huge plus as a blogger was the zippy WiFi!!! :)

Loved getting to know Sovay during a memorable evening spent in the salon!  So memorable in fact that I returned for a service of my own!

Highly recommended and make sure to eat at the local Mexican restaurants.  Some of the best I've had outside of Mexico itself!!

After searching days for the perfect place I found this!!!!!
I was in search of a honeymoon destination for my step daughter and her soon to be husband. My step daughter trusted me enough to make the reservations and keep it a surprise till the wedding day. Her request were Austin and maybe a B & B if possible. After contacting Drew and communicating with him I knew i had found the right place.
Thank you Drew for making this so easy for me. The kids really enjoyed their stay. Super cute place!!!!!

It was a joy to stay with you and a pleasure to meet you both.
Thank you for your suggestions on what to see and do in Austin.
Your place is just wonderful peaceful and well equipped and 
I would love to come back and stay again.
Your coffee is just phenomenal and it was a huge benefit
in staying with you.  Loved the breakfast options too.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: Ashley is a wonderful and accommodating host. Her bungalow is cute and full of character homey comfortable and tucked away in a quiet area that you'd never know is so so close to down town.
listing_name: FAB 2 bDR where Airbnb CEO stays!

comments:
make sure you have a car as a taxi ride is $20-25 to downtown.

other than that this house was perfect.  guido was a gracious host and the house had soap towels and other stuff.  the internet was reliable and A/C worked throughout the house (although the garage was an oven).

if you are a family you should really skip the hotel and stay here instead... if you are a startup which is the way we travel it works well too.

his wife? ( i think ) greeted us when we showed up to the house and gave us a tour.  and he showed up halfway through are stay to make sure everything was in order.

Andy and Ellen were wonderful hosts.
We had a great stay at the cottage. It had everything we needed and more. The bikes provided were fantastic and we had a nice ride on the trails close to the cottage. We also took the bus downtown which was very convenient (an easy 15-20 minute ride). Also within walking distance to Kerby Lane Cafe and the Draught House both great places to grab a beer or some food.

We'd highly recommend the Central Cottage!

I had a great stay at Angele's apartment for 2 1/2 weeks. The apartment is beautifully furnished and clean and everything that you need is available or close by. Angele was also extremely helpful especially when I lost the key! I fully recommend staying here!

Michael's apartment is in a fantastic location in the South Congress area - we were close to food trucks restaurants and various shops (Allens Boots Uncommon Objects Amy's Ice Creams etc). Had we been less spoiled by California weather we could've made it all the way to downtown by foot as well.  Not only was the apartment cozy and bright but the fridge was thoughtfully stocked with a few drinks and sweets for us to enjoy too!
This was a beautiful quiet and comfortable space in a great part of town.
It was perfect! The house Daniel and the dogs made my Mother's & I stay so enjoyable

I can not say enough good things about Sovay's wonderful little bungalow!  If you are coming to Austin this is the place to stay... close to everything fun very private clean and beautiful.  And Sovay is an excellent host... I had completely forgotten to pack sunscreen for our trip and there in the bathroom Sovay had an array of all the little things you might forget to pack on your trip... including sunscreen! Thank you Sovay for a wonderful experience in Austin :)

Great place and great location within walking distance of South Congress. After driving all over Austin it was nice to park the car and walk to dinner and breakfast the next morning. John and his wife were perfect hosts. I'd recommend  highly.
Marcus was awesome and totally let us stay last minute! Thanks so much for the cool digs. Central location!

The little yellow cottage is awesome! It is adorable spotless and very comfortable. Wi-fi is provided and there are plenty of restaurants nearby. Mary thinks of everything - and provides delicious coffee!

I liked the location too - about twelve blocks from all the fun things on South Congress but definitely walkable if its not too hot =)

All in all a terrific option while in Austin!

I really enjoyed my stay at the cottage.  It was a very nice break after being on the road for a couple of weeks to be able to stay in one place with a good bed (sorry Dad..but you need a new guestbed) and not have housekeeping knocking on your door in the morning.  It was a nice place to get some work done and Sara was very nice.   Also the location was great.  You could get downtown in just a few minutes.   I would come back and stay here again.
Great accommodation in a great location close to downtown and all facilities I would definitely recommend.

I absolutely loved Sylvia's humble apartment above her garage. It was the perfect location!! She had coffee and tea waiting for us her bathroom is absolutely adorable and her VHS collection gave us an excellent background to getting ready. We would definitely visit Austin again and stay in Sylvia's apartment.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments:
Five stars is not enough to rate how great our stay was here.  

Dolina has created the perfect place to escape the hectic pace of daily life and just relax. She was the perfect hostess to introduce us to the concept of Airbnb.  Thoughtful and courteous and never short on everything you need for a good cup of tea!

Copious amounts of natural light fill the soft and inviting space here.  The interior design is immaculate and it seems that everywhere provided to sit or lay here is comfortable.  I highly recommend spending a good amount of time in the upstairs loft with a good book.

Clean quiet and perfectly located right near the shops on South Congress.

We will without doubt try and stay here again.
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments:
A great example of South Austin. This studio is in the perfect location close to everything that makes Austin-Austin. Centrally located for an easily accessible adventure to other parts of the city.
Fun music decor very comfortable private space for one or two very comfortable futon good Austin literature to read nice amenities and very helpful and considerate hosts. I will definitely stay there there again should the opportunity arise.

We would highly recommend this property!  David is a great host! Everything was as promised. Don't miss a relaxing evening on the dock. Location is convenient to routes to anywhere in Austin area.
Condo is very comfortable and well equipped.  Weather was quite hot for we midwesterners but the AC works great. If we return to Austin David will be the first person I will contact about accommodations.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: This was a wonderful place to stay.  It's in a beautiful neighborhood.  Susan and Anthony were wonderful hosts.  They even left us a few boxes of toys and books for our toddler.  So thoughtful.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: A+ B & B experience.  Great cottage generously stocked kitchen helpful hosts.  You will love it too.

It is the best place you can stay in Austin. The room is bright clean; the bed is comfortable; internet connection and A/C work perfectly. The two hosts Dhoi and her husband are really cool people they give you tips about the city let you use the kitchen and even offer to clean your room! Then there is the location. You are in downtown and you have a bunch of awesome bars and restaurant within 2-3 blocks. The price? You can't beat it. Highly recommended.

I felt comfortable right away everything was clean and I had everything I needed.  I stayed 10 days and never had a problem.  I highly recommend this property it is priced right and in the middle of Austin.

The Bungalow was fantastic and Sovay was so great to coordinate with! I spent very little time at home so I wasn't able to meet Sovay but she has a wonderful place. Great location and very welcoming. I especially enjoyed the coffee shop and food trucks up the street. I feel like I had a much more authentic Austin experience than I would have in a hotel.

Thank you for everything!

Megan

Lisa was an excellent host and the condo was exactly what we were looking for. It's located in a quiet awesome neighborhood walking distance to all the important things (Walgreens and breakfast tacos) and being just a few miles outside of downtown made it a breeze to get around.
I really can't emphasize enough how nice the space was. I've stayed in suites who's bed fails to compare to the pile of princess mattresses she has. It's exactly like the picture. 

If you're looking for quiet hideaway not too far from everything this place works out nicely.
Enjoyed the stay at Susan's house everthing was as advertised. It was clean and neat and the location was ideal would stay here again.  Recommended.

It was truly love at first sight when I entered the Birdhouse!  Great accommodations that are a great blend of comfort smart design and global style.  I highly recommend it and have already booked my return stay! :)
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: David's condo was the perfect place to stay for my vacation. It was spacious clean and conveniently located with a great view of the city from the dock in the back yard. I would highly recommend it!
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: WOW!! I found this place on a very short notice and I am so happy I did!! It was a beautiful and welcoming place to stay!  We came to Austin to celebrate a birthday and had friends fly in and this was a much better place to stay at then any other hotel!!!  The breakfast that was prepared for us the next morning was delicious!!!  I would recommend this place to anyone!!  This is where I will stay when I bring friends and family to Austin!!  Thank you Viviane!!!

Thanks Lois! We really had a lot of fun staying at your place. The title describes it perfectly. It was nice to feel integrated into the city and more like a local than I have on my other trips to Austin. Thank you! I would definitely recommend it.
The cottage was very nicely appointed and everything was very warm. The place felt very private and the hosts were very helpful with our dog. We would def stay here again.
The home was lovely. When can I move in? Everything was clean and comfortable. The bed was great! Jenny was personable and helpful. Great first experience with Air BNB. Thanks.

David was pleasant and easy to communicate with. The room was a small but beautiful and carefully designed space reminds me of hotel rooms in northern Europe  -with a full kitchen a nice flat screen TV and cool ceiling windows that you can stick your head out of. The location is in the middle of everything in Hyde park with lots of trees all around.  

The room is a converted upper floor attic and the stairway leading to it is steep -almost a ladder.  While we did not mind this (my kids thought it was fun) it might prove challenging for some especially if they were carrying bags.  I would not have my parents stay here.

It was my first visit to Austin and I'm so glad I stayed at Sovay's place.  She's a charming hostess and the accommodations were perfect.  I slept soundly on the very comfortable bed. The neighborhood is quiet safe and charming.  Next time I visit Austin I will definitely stay there again.
The bungalow was great and Sovay was really nice and helpful.  We really loved the coffee at the nearby Bouldin Creek Cafe!

We really enjoyed our three-night stay in the cottage and look forward to a return visit. Very comfortable and peaceful. Our hosts provided a well-stocked refrigerator for breakfasts and snacks. The perfect retreat for a visit to Austin.

What a perfect retreat for a girlfriend getaway! The Cozy Casita was clean comfortable and tres chic! It had everything we needed: coffee and tea (real milk and sugar-no creamer!) everything we needed to make a quick breakfast and snacks. There is lovely art on the walls. It is a really comfortable guest house.

Dolina was a great hostess. She was very helpful with recommendations about what to do and where to go. This is a great place to stay and I would stay here again!
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments:
We are a family of 4 originally from Austin.  We were headed to town to attend a family wedding.  We decided to take a break from a hotel set up and experience a rental instead.  This was the best decision we made setting up our trip!

This cottage is centrally located and can easily get you to the major and minor thoroughfares in Austin.  It is situated in the best part of town - south central Austin.  The house is as represented in the pictures.

Mary is the best hostess you could ask for.  We were welcomed with a fridge stocked with breakfast juice muffins and soft drinks for the boys.  The house was impeccable - very clean with everything you would need to enjoy a comfortable stay.

The beds were the most comfortable I have ever used with wonderful bed linens and blankets;  Mary has decorated the place to feel very warm and welcoming.  Having a nice flat screen t.v. with blu ray player and DVDs to choose from was very convenient on a few occasions.  

Our family had a great time and we all agreed this will be the place to come back to stay when we visit family in the future.  I would recommend Mary's place with the highest level of confidence.

Sunny spacious studio apartment perfectly equipped to accommodate a short-to-medium stay in Austin. Hosts are friendly outgoing and accommodating doing everything to make the stay enjoyable (including a welcome wine and chocolate!) Two thumbs up for this unique alternative to the box-hotel experience. It is my first choice to stay next time I visit Austin.

My stay with Sovay was absolutely delightful.  The suite is perfectly set up for out of town visitors. The house is charming clean and comfortable and Sovay is a wonderful hostess.  Highly recommend staying with her.

My husband needed a 3-week stay before our move to Austin and I'm so glad I ran across this site and Elizabeth's room listing! She and David were very gracious hosts and extremely accommodating. Their home is quite nice very clean and in a nice neighborhood. Their easy-going style was perfect for us. Elizabeth let my husband leave his car at her house while he flew back to VA to help with the move which was great that we didn't have to garage it for a week. Our move ended up running a day later and Elizabeth allowed us to come back and stay another night (my first time there).  We would recommend them any time!  Awesome people awesome place!

Susan & Anthony's place is lovely peacefully nestled among gorgeous oaks and full of comfort yet centrally located with all of greats of Austin locales within a skip and hop.  They are both  wonderful attentive hosts which a five star rating deserves several plus+++.  I highly recommend their place and know that I will return.
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments:
Tyler was fun relaxed host. He went out of his way to make us feel welcome and comfortable He gave us great recommendations about some of the best spots in Austin. He even took us out to some of these places.

If you want to experience what Austin has to offer with a guy who knows how to have a good time I recommend staying with Tyler. This is by no means a fancy hotel room so keep your expectations realistic. This is however a fantastic way to experience Austin and one of its finest. 

Also definitely recommend check out his band- their music is great and they put on a great show.
listing_name: South Austin Aptmnt Room for rent

comments: We had such a great stay here!  It was clean cool and the perfect walking distance from all of the cute shops and restaurants of SoCo.  This place is a real gem.  Thanks John for being such a great host...we hope to stay here again if we come back to Austin!!

My girlfriend and I stayed at the cottage for two nights and we had a fantastic experience. Set in a beautiful neighborhood the cottage has all the privacy you need with the convenience of location. The fridge was fully stocked and the place was immaculately clean. The two great mountain bikes are an additional perk and when we had some trouble with the locks Andy actually interrupted his day to come home and help us with them. The bikes proved to be a great way to explore the city. Could not recommend this place enough! We'll be back the next time we're in Austin.

This space and location turned out to be perfect for our family's week-long stay in Austin. We have two kids one 6 mo and one 3.5 yo and with the kitchen nearby restaurants & shops and central location we found it easy to work with everyone's schedules and various feeding & entertainment needs. 

The apartment is cool with a great king-sized bed spacious shower and really convenient kitchen. I loved the architecture of the two buildings and Michael & Stephanie's taste in decor bath soap and fridge/freezer snacks (a wonderful surprise yum!) Very nice easy stay with great hosts!

Onion Creek Ranch is the peaceful night's sleep surrounded by the warmth and decor of the Texas friendly ranch setting and still so close to Austin business arts district music venues and the Airport. Comfortable bed and clean nice shower. Lin is the gracious hostess that makes you feel like family. So fun to wake up to the rooster crowing a greeting to the new sunny day in beautiful Austin Texas! -Jettie

My husband and I just got home from a weekend at David's space. We had a really peaceful stay in this clean and quiet loft. Great neighborhood we walked to most of our meals as well as to the grocery store. David was quick to answer any needs we had (he even made a trip out to bring us coffee- very kind.) I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a retreat from the clutter of life. The layout and overall feel was lovely and well thought out. Lots of great movies on demand walking distance to all things wonderful and great host. The two huge skylight windows open up to enormous old oak trees and the sound of birds the parking was easy the location is ideal. We will be back.

This condo was super convenient and has everything you need for a great stay in Austin.  There's a full kitchen washer/dryer lots of storage place for clothes food and suitcases.  It was a short pleasant walk to all the action and very quiet for relaxing nights in.  Angele was very accessible by phone/text and email throughout our stay was quick to respond and was very sweet.  Thanks Angele!

Sylvia's place was great! Solid location for hitting up both Downtown & East Austin (where apparently all the cool kids are hanging these days).

Clean comfortable quiet. A nice collection of 90s VHS tapes and obscure bunch of 'promotional' CDs. Couldn't ask for more! Thanks Sylvia--
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Had a wonderful stay. My host was very helpful with directions for driving around the city. She had great recommendations for wonderful places to eat and letting me know some of the Austin's highlights. My room was very clean as was her home.  Enjoyed watch the squirrels raid the bird feeder in the back yard.  Would definitely recommend anyone to stay here. Thanks Tammy

Drew is GREAT host! Like all the reviews say he has earned the superhost title. I had a few questions about restaurants and he took lots of time to give me helpful advice and awesome suggestions. When I asked about taxis at the airport he went above and beyond and arranged to have a taxi waiting for us when we arrived. The studio apartment above the garage is really cute and super clean. The only downside we experienced was the noise from the garage door when it opened and closed (it a little loud and woke us up). However this only happened a couple times and I would certainly still recommend this place.

Fantastic property and awesome host!  I contacted Lois at the last minute and she happily accommodated me.  The place itself is uniquepeaceful and private.  Great neighborhood right next to Downtown Austin.  I would recommend to anyone staying in the area.

I had the pleasure of staying at Lisa's apartment this past weekend. She was sweet enough to leave a bottle of wine along with other goodies in the fridge. She also left a detailed list of directions for the house and how to get a cab etc. The apartment is adorable and represented very well. I loved her style especially her music posters of some of my favorite bands (Bauhaus and The Smiths!). The bed was also very comfortable. She was easily available for any questions and we had no issues during our stay. Would definitely recommend her place if you're visiting Austin. It's about a 10 minute drive from downtown so best to have a car but you can access the bus system in a fairly quick walk (7-10 minutes) and cabs are easy enough to call.

Thank you Lisa for allowing us to stay! I signed the book! :-)

We had the loveliest time staying at Dan's garden apt.  From the moment we were in touch about the rental Dan was just great; fast communicator so flexible endlessly helpful and welcoming.  He even picked us up at the airport!
The space was perfect for us (my boyfriend and I) it is not large but we live in NYC so thought it was just great! Totally private plently of closet space beautiful light and a really good shower too.  The garden Dan has cultivated is wonderful with a real Austin vibe.  The surrounding neighborhood was really enjoyable too; we felt like locals!  We didn't spend a ton of time in the apt (as we were out and about in Austin) but it was a wonderful home-base.  
The only thing to be aware of it that it is a bit far from the center of town without a car especially if you are used to having one at home.  We spent 4 days and did a ton of walking took a couple buses and taxis which worked for us but is maybe not everyone's idea of a vacation!

I had a great time staying here. The bungalow was private pristine and pretty. Sovay was quick to respond to my queries and stopped by to welcome me my first night. I can't imagine a better experience.

This place was awesome!  Met Kelly and her husband Louie as they were leaving for the weekend so we were all alone.  The cottage was comfortable super quiet and in a great location; close to everything.  I would say that there is a flight of stairs up to the cottage so if anyone has a mobility impairment it may make it a little difficult.  Kelly left milk and coffee and an iron (necessary for a wedding!) and we had a wonderful time.  Would definitely stay here again!

Elizabeth and James were excellent hosts. We have a active family with two young hyperactive kids. They opened up their home to us and some friends of ours who stopped by to visit. We had a nice relaxing stay and a good nights sleep.
listing_name: Hip Downtown East House with Bikes!

comments:
My daughter and I had a very relaxing time there.When we did have time to hang out on Sunday afternoon my daughter was able to roam around and explore their beautiful grounds. 

Bill and Melissa were very friendly and helpful but made sure to give us space to rest and relax. 

We will definitely be back.

We had a wonderful stay!  Mary was incredibly thoughtful and the yellow cottage was squeaky clean charming had everything we could possibly need and was conveniently located.  The code on the door was helpful as there were two couples staying in the house and we didn't have to worry about sharing keys. The yard is enormous so there was lots of privacy and it was quiet.  Loved it!  We'll definitely see if it's available the next time we head to Austin!  This was my first time using airbnb and it was a perfect solution - great location and way cheaper than a boring hotel!

This was a wonderful condo with tile floors and granite countertops and in a great location.  It had a nice little patio and a short walkway to the river which had a dock where you could sit and enjoy a glass wine at the end of a nice day.  We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: Staying at the Zilker Guesthouse makes you  feel like you live in Austin.  A great location with a cute house.  We really enjoyed our stay.
Had a fun couple of days here.  Explored 1st St. and S Congress and enjoyed plenty of nearby eats.  All the comforts of home.  Thanks!

The Empty Nest was great!  It was spacious and very clean.  The location is fantastic.  It is close to UT campus downtown Whole Foods Zilker etc.  Gina and her husband were very welcoming.  It was nice to stay in a home instead of a hotel especially with our baby.
The cottage was an excellent place for our stay.  Andy provided great tips about Austin and the surrounding area. Would love to stay there on the next visit to Austin!

What a wonderful place! Walking distance to 6th Street and downtown. Or if you're tired a very short taxi ride. Wonderful private apartment with all the amenities you require. Wonderful bed!
Sylvia was a wonderful host kindly meeting meet at the airport and driving me to the bus depot when sadly it was time to leave Austin.
Heartily recommended!
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Unique fun home that served our needs.  Robbie was a great host and the house was clean and in great shape.  Loved the decks.

Sovay was the perfect host! She was super helpful and came and said hello as soon as we arrived. She showed us all the right places to go and   had a great house and lovely dogs. The room was private the bed was really comfy and the bathroom and shower was lovely. Our stay in Austin was perfect and I would highly recommend staying with Sovay. Thank you Sovay for being so welcoming this was my first time staying with someone and you put both me and my partner at complete ease!
Great location and place to stay!  The Millers' are the best hosts that will try to make your stay in Austin as comfortable as possible!  I had a great time staying at the cottage!
I don't want to say much because I want everyone to experience time with bill and Melissa in their own way.

This was the perfect base for exploring the great city of Austin and my friends and I are most grateful to Mary both for keeping a lovely house and for being so quick and helpful in responding to any questions we had. Mary had generously stocked the house with everything we needed (food and drink towels toiletries etc.) and the file she had produced on her favourite local places was a useful treat. Many thanks!
Lois is a great host and her place is unique quiet and close to many amenities.  This was my second stay and I hope to come back again.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Sara's guest cottage.  The cottage was clean charming and close to the university/downtown Austin.  The bed was comfy the room was spacious and the cottage itself was private and secure.  Highly recommended!

Lisa's condo was great! Nicely decorated and very cute! Clean as well.  Older apartment complex but it was clean and quiet. No traffic noise and the neighbors were friendly.  My only problem was Lisa doesn't watch TV so has no cable. That's cool but I would have liked to watched a little TV late at night to fall asleep. I know she has a DVD player but I didn't want to get into a movie and stay up late. Otherwise I would definately stay again (even without TV!) and would recommend this place to others. Lisa was nice to accomodate me at the very last minute. 

Thanks again!
Cindy

Dan was great and totally laid back.  The location was great about 2 miles from downtown and only a $15 cab ride including a tip.  My friend and I had a great time and really enjoyed Dan's beautiful and peaceful back yard.

Daniel's guesthouse was perfect!!  Many thanks for providing such wonderful accommodations for our visitor's trip to Austin.  A quiet little sanctuary that is just a stone's throw from downtown s. lamar soco and all the lovely areas of this city.  Clean and comfortable and a smooth and effortless transaction!  Thank you.

My sister and her daughters absolutely loved staying at this house!  The location is terrific and the hosts were more than accommodating.  My nieces especially enjoyed all of the toys that were there for them to play with.  I would definitely recommend this house to future guests.

My boyfriend and his brother and I stayed in Ashley's house for a week while she was away. We had a great time and a very comfortable stay. This was our first AirBnB experience and we were all very pleased. Before our stay Ashley called us to introduce herself and to give us the details on the house and she had even gone out of her way to research the cheapest car rental option for us. We had no problem getting into the house and when we arrived it was as cozy and comfortable as all the reviews here state. Great beds fast internet cool art books cool decor nice bathroom and kitchen and a cute little back patio to read or enjoy a home cooked meal. It is conveniently located in the heart of Austin on a quiet safe little street walking distance to many shops bars and restaurants. We had an opportunity to meet Ashley in person for lunch before we left town and she is so friendly and charming! I'm sorry we didnt get to spend more time with her but we plan to keep in touch and hopefully we will see her the next time she comes to visit NY :)
listing_name: FAB 2 bDR where Airbnb CEO stays!

comments: The house was perfect. Very private separate side entrance coffee maker great part of Austin. Susan even offered to drive me into Austin!  I'd recommend Susan's place to anyone!
listing_name: Tarrytown Apt - just West of DT!

comments: Clean nice place to stay in South Austin.  Host gave great instructions.

We were traveling with our 3 year old and her grandmother and the house worked perfectly for all of us.  Katherine was extremely helpful friendly and responsive.  She was so accommodating when we really needed it! The house was lovely -- simple classy understated; fun treats in the kitchen and a sweet little shady deck to sit outside and enjoy the morning.  It was such an easy walk to South Congress -- pretty easy striking distance of freeways and downtown also.  Overall just a great experience.

Lovely home set in a peaceful location close to everything you will enjoy in downtown Austin.  The pictures don't lie!  My husband and I enjoyed our weekend stay very much and especially appreciated the stocked refrigerator allowing us a nice relaxed morning making breakfast together in the spacious kitchen.  We hope to return!  It should be noted that guests over 6'5" will have a bit of trouble fitting in the shower--it wasn't a big problem for us (my husband is 6'5") but future tall guests should take note.

Marcus was a great host and his place was really awesome exactly as described.  He was easy to contact and checked on us to make sure we had everything we needed.  The experience was way better than a hotel.  I will definitely try to come back when I am in town.  Thanks Marcus.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Courtney and Steve's house for a weekend and it was just perfect. The house was easy to find at night and the check-in and check-out process was a breeze. We came in to fine a nice welcome note on the table with some instructions on public transportation in the area. The house has lovely and simple decorations with a subtle bird theme throughout that I loved. The bed was very comfortable the house was very clean and there were fresh towels waiting for us on the bed when we arrived. They have a nice big backyard and were nice enough to let me bring my dog along for the trip and left tennis balls for her to chase. I loved that they had a nice big recycling container for everything and a compost container in the backyard- it felt like home!
We come to Austin every few months and would definitely stay here again. Thanks!!

A brilliant experience. Dolina gave us great instructions on how to get there and when we arrived it was just as we expected and more. The house was perfect and stylishly decorated and we were provided fresh local produce for us to enjoy. Dolina spent time with us giving us local tips and ideas for days out (which we did and were great). Location is close to South Congress and also gives you easy access out of town in a car for day trips. Perfect Airbnb holiday.
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: My husband and I shared a wonderful weekend away here. I loved the decor here! The condo felt so friendly and cozy and it was close to everything we wanted to do. The kitchen was well-equipped for light cooking. Lynne gave us plenty of information by email before our stay and stayed in touch while we were there. We hope to stay here again!

The East-Side Bungalow is the best house ever!!!! We had a terrific stay in this cozy and adorable place.  Shawn was very welcoming and accommodating and the location was perfect.  A quick 15 min walk or 2 min cab ride to all the action downtown but tucked away in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood.  The experience was far better than any hotel I have ever stayed in.

We had a fantastic time in Austin!  Sovay's place is adorable and so clean.    She was available if you ever needed a recommendation for a good restaurant or had any questions.  She also gave us a list of fun places to visit. The location was great. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay.
She was a really great host with a lot of suggestions about where to go and what to do in Austin. The room was neat and comfy the pets adorable and the environment was great. It was a cool experience
Michele was a great hostess. She made my dog and I feel very welcome in her home and went above and beyond to help me start to learn my way around the city.  Great experience!

We had a great time in Austin and Sylvia was part of that experience.  She was friendly responsive and informative.  The efficiency apartment was clean everything worked and was in a great location.  We were able to walk to the bus stop and to a number of restaurants in the area.  We highly recommend this place and host and would gladly stay there again next time we're in Austin.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: We had a wonderful stay!  The loft was so clean and open and bright.....we enjoyed visiting with the chickens geese and of course Bentley the dog.  We were brought muffins cheese snack bars fruit and artisan bread....who could as for more.  We sat out at night on the deck and it was like being in a tree house.  The property is just lovely and our hosts were the best......would definitely stay here again.

Kelly's apartment was a welcome sight after an 8 hour journey! The apartment itself isolated from the main house but still closeby is set in a beautiful neighborhood which feels very safe! With new furnishings throughout the house and with every appliance we could need our stay was extremely pleasant. Kelly and Louie were brilliant hosts readily available to answer our questions but allowed us to come and go as we pleased! We would stay here again if ever in Austin and would recommend it to anyone looking to explore the city.

Lester was a great host.  He was welcoming and generous.

The room was just fine.  The bed super comfy.  

Recommended stay.
listing_name: SOCO One private room in a 2B house

comments:
This is a wonderful place to stay.  I enjoyed it.
Sovay is an inspiration.
I loved this place!  Sovay has thought of everything her guests might need.  Great bed lots of space a home away from home!
Lisa's place was exactly as advertised-great location close to downtown and the Barton Springs Pool clean and cozy!
Very cool place with attention to detail.  Only stayed one night. We loved the little kitchen - will bring some things for the fridge next time and perhaps have time for the hot tub!

This is a great house. I would definitely rent it again. To me it's in the perfect locationƒ??South Austin is right outside your door and you're not far from everything else. The house is very nicely styled and was spotlessly clean when we arrived. The kitchen has everything you would need and the host had it generously stocked with coffees teas and breakfast items. The host was also very friendly and easy to reach. Highly recommended!!!!
Love the coziness!

LOVED Scott's place in Austin.  The house has everything you need and is extremely clean cozy and comfortable!  Terrific terrific porch and was a nice easy walk to 6th St. and downtown.  Scott was terrific - easy personable and made sure we had all that we needed.  Highly recommend this house for a good taste of Austin!!!!
listing_name: Fun East Austin Home for ACL SXSW!

comments: Dan is The Man! My husband and I stayed at Dan's little apartment recently and we had a great time.  The design and layout is totally cute.  The shower is especially cool.  If you want to experience a slice of authentic south Austin - this is your place.  The neighborhood is very quiet and tucked away from all the action over on Soutth 1st.  We'll be back!

We had a fabulopus stay at Ashleys place. She was a great host.
Joe Garrigan
listing_name: FAB 2 bDR where Airbnb CEO stays!

comments:
The Central Cottage was a great place to stay in Austin.  We arrived at the cottage to see it was nestled on a tree lined street in a quiet neighborhood.  The bikes they provided were in good condition and we did take them out for a day however the locks might be a bit intimidating for some... there were quite a few!  The dogs barked a little but they were in a fenced in back yard so no need to worry.  The cottage looks exactly the same as the pictures on the air bnb site and we were quite pleased.  The fridge was stocked with plenty of juice and items for breakfast.  If you want to do a lot downtown plan on about a $15 fare for a cab we took the bus almost everyday which was a $1-$2 fare.  The stop was conveniently located about six blocks from the cottage.  I would recommend the cottage to a friend or family member!  

Thanks!!

Good communication from Pete comfortable house with plenty of amenities great neighborhood close to everything. Overall a very enjoyable stay. I only wish there was more outdoor area. There was a large shared backyard and front porch but no real outdoor hangout infrastructure.
listing_name: Historic Hyde Park Home By Downtown

comments: This was a great place to stay in Austin.   We enjoyed the loft studio the picturesque  neighborhood proximity to various shopping and eating and our gracious host.  The space itself was delightful tastefully furnished clean comfortable and welcoming.  Highly recommend it!
The Bird House is Fabulous! It is so comfortable and cozy my daughter and I really enjoyed our stay. Dolina the host was exceptional nice and helpful. Will stay again!
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: Here's what my mom Elizabeth said about staying in the flat:  "My brief four day stay at Drew Arnold's Hyde Park place was serenely charming.  The flat was spacious comfortable and quiet.  Drew was gracious and helpful.  When I arrived not only was the flat sparkling clean but a lovely rose bottle of wine and bar of chocolate greeted me upon my arrival.  I will never stay in a hotel room again when there accommodations like this.  On a scale of 1 to 10 Drew's Hyde Park flat gets a 10!"

This guest cottage was perfect for an extended weekend. The hosts provided everything from towels to coffee and orange juice. We were able to come and go without hassle and sleep in a very cleanhip and comfortable room. Id highly recommend Sara's cottage to any single person or couple staying in the Austin area.

Our stay at Merri and Donald's house was nothing short of incredible.  The property was even more amazing than it appeared in the pictures and description.  It is apparent that they love to entertain as they have thought of everything to make their home comfortable.  

The relaxed mid-century design mixes seamlessly with modern conveniences: the 1970's stereo/turntable combo in the living room is wired to an extra speaker in the bathroom (great when you're getting ready in the morning) the beautiful wooden mantle is home to an HDTV and the retro kitchen (with reliable well-maintained appliances) includes a microwave and coffee maker.  The beyond adequate bedding in both rooms provided for a sound night's sleep and each room contained plenty of closet and drawer space.  One of the best features of the house is the back patio which had plenty of chairs (both stationary and rocking) and tables perfect for enjoying a cup of coffee while basking in the perfect Austin weather.
 
Merri and Donald actually live downstairs of the house but we never noticed them there at all.  Merri popped up twice to say hi (once at the beginning and once towards the end--with her awesome black lab!) and we chatted like old friends.  She's incredibly easy going and welcoming and we only wished that we were staying the next weekend so we could come to their epic sounding backyard Halloween party.  

I wholeheartedly recommend this place if you want the real Austin experience: a funky abode in a quiet neighborhood and the friendliest hosts you could ever ask for.
The house was great- clean comfortable well located. Katherine shared details of where she would be and how to reach her and was available but unobtrusive.

Sovay was a great hostess-her house was well put together for guests and was in an easy location to get around.  My sister and I had a great time in Austin and slept comfortably in the peaceful setting!  Sovay was helpful with tips for seeing Austin!

Staying in Belle's 'aerie backyard house' was a lovely experience. It was close enough to the city to access all we needed to and Belle herself was very hospitable (made us a delicious lemon pound cake even gave us a ride to the bus station on our way out!)

The backyard house itself was spacious and tranquil self-contained with everything you need (tea coffee a/c) - a haven amongst the trees. HIGHLY recommended.

Great little apartment ƒ?? Sylvia was incredibly welcoming and put in 3 beds for myself and my 2 friends. Provided it's not too hot when you go to Austin it's actually really convenient for the bus from the airport (about a 15-minute walk) and to walk to places on 6th St.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Great house everything really well done!  Really well decorated.  Will stay here again for sure.

David and Julia's condo was just as described. My girlfriend and I loved the condo and the view of the lake was amazing. Nothing like getting home from a great night on the town sitting on the lighted lake dock and drinking a bottle of wine. We'd recommend the condo to anyone who wants to enjoy Austin and not necessarily be downtown.
listing_name: Waterfront Condo on Lady Bird Lake

comments: Sevylla goes above and beyond!!   Due to a traumatic accident that left me in the hospital my reservations were changed a couple of times costing Sevylla several days of rentals..  Sevylla was concerned and accomodating and still hosted my wife Amy.  Amy raved about both Sevylla and the Studio.....Highly recommended!!

i feel compelled to write this. i stould at salon by sovay  and it was the best!a cute bungalow with everything you could ask for.very clean!the people who work there and primarily sovay are friendly.a great placei would reccommend sovays place to everyone!



steve a.

A quick Austin trip for business was made into a mini-vacation by the twist of fate that led me to book the casita for 2 nights. Dolina was very accommodating accepting my reservation request literally at the last minute. (It was complete luck that was even possible since the casita was booked all week except for the 2 nights I needed. This place is popular - book early!) Thoughtful design touches and smart use-of-space is everywhere - and have me looking over my own house now with thoughts of remodeling. The bed and pillows were very comfortable and the neighborhood is quiet; I slept soundly. The coffee left for the french press was excellent and the kitchen had everything I needed to prep a happy-hour spread of wine/cheese/etc. for 2 coworkers one evening. I plan to return whenever I am in Austin. Thanks for a wonderful stay!
listing_name: Cozy Casita Near Downtown in SoCo

comments: Great house and room well located and very friendly hosts!
David was very accommodating and a great host and I would use his place again in a heartbeat. The modern loft is exactly what it is.... very unique and a great place to stay!

Great space. Perfect location. Fantastic hosts. 

The apartment was:
-clean
-spacious
-comfortable (e.g. king bed; assorted pillows ranging from firm to fluffy)
-tastefully decorated with contemporary styling
-quality furnishings (e.g. good shower water pressure)
-lots of natural light
-safe (motion sensor lighting locked gates keypad entry to the apartment)
-stocked with necessities (I packed my own toiletries but the bathroom had everything from shaving cream and razors to shampoo and body wash to a cadre of assorted over-the-counter medications -- just in case.)

The hosts were friendly and helpful. Michael answered all my questions promptly before my arrival including arranging for a bicycle I could use.

Above and beyond: 
-complementary wine in the fridge and Ben & Jerry's ice cream in the freezer
-during my stay Michael stayed connected at all times via text answering my questions and even checking in with me to be certain I was doing well and that my needs were taken care of 
-suggested restaurants particular to my vegan diet
-drove me to retrieve my lost purse (I really appreciated having his help navigating my mini-crisis)

My only disappointment was that my schedule didn't allow me to stay longer!

Oasis is right! I was in Austin for a conference and wanted a play to crash and decompress afterwards. This was perfect! I arrived Tammy showed me the ropes then it was like my home away from home. I was wiped out so I enjoyed the BEAUTIFUL back yard area for a while to read then zonked out early and slept until the morning when I was able to relax enjoy the yard again and rejuvenate. I would absolutely stay here again next time I'm in Austin and highly recommend it.

Letting made on very short notice but was easy and simple to arrange and David was accommodating. Very friendly house even gave us some good advice on how to park in town and some good restaurants to try out. The flat is finished to the absolute highest quality with some really nice little finishes (especially the bathroom). The addition of a TV on demand system in the room with a wide selection of movies and TV shows was a welcome added bonus!
Another great stay.  Easy walk to Town Lake and downtown. Will be back.
Ash what a lovely place you got there.  Cant wait to stay there another time when Im back in (website hidden) e location is superb...steps from Whole Foods...your bed is sooooo comfy!!!
listing_name: FAB 2 bDR where Airbnb CEO stays!

comments: I highly recommend Marcus' accomodations.  He is warm personable and the location is in a verdant historic neighborhood.
We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again! Convenient location and comfy bed. I would definitely recommend it.

Sylvia picked us up at the airport despite having a flight delay provided great recommendations and was a very gracious hostess.  The studio was quiet private and well-equipped.  We were close to the downtown area but far enough away to enjoy peace and quiet. Sylvia's recommendations were right on the mark.  We enjoyed Austin and plan to return.  Sylvia thank you for making our first trip to Austin a pleasant experience.
listing_name: Walk to 6th St and Convention Ctr

comments: Great location and highly conducive to bike riders. The house itself is awesome with a fun artistic flare! Best for people who know each other pretty well as there is no real door on the bathroom simply a curtain :) really liked Fiona she was very nice considerate flexible and accommodating. I'd definitely stay here again!
